DESCRIPTION: Juicy Couture is a glamorous, irreverent, and fun lifestyle brand for the decidedly fashionable, bringing LA style and attitude to girls all over the world. Embracing its Los Angeles heritage, Juicy discovers the couture in the everyday and delivers an element of surprise in all of its designs.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - Apparel, Handbags, Accessories, Shoes, and Fragrance

DESCRIPTION: Julie Josephine Essentials is a Norwegian fashion brand established in 2016 by Julie Josephine Blystad. We believe creating pieces that are long lasting with a classic design, will make you invest in well thought through pieces. Our theory is buy less, just increase the quality of your product. This will help us all become more environmentally friendly. Our collections are defined by simplicity, functionality and iconic silhouettes. A clean-lined aesthetic with a sense of ease. Focusing on exceptional fabrics and perfected cuts, to form a classic signature. We value the smallest details in every piece, which is what makes them unique and wearable throughout time. It all began with ”the perfect white tee”. Today, the brilliance of our rare jersey exists in a complete capsule collection. The pieces from our jersey collection is knitted in a mid-weight cotton that is exceptionally kind to the skin. It’s durable, easy to care for and not see-through. Each piece is developed to simplify your everyday life, so it’s important to us that they stay in shape for years. We continuously thrive to create outstanding pieces from the same quality to make sure that you never question what to wear ever again.

A classic collection of 16 cult fragrances, composed as olfactory portraits, and 7 fragrances from our luxury collection, true tributes to the material. Exclusively feminine, the Juliette Has a Gun fragrances reveal as many faces of Juliette's personality, mutinous, vengeful, fiery, androgynous, cavalier or immaterial.

Junge is a Danish fashion brand that has designed outerwear for stylish and confident women. Building on 75 years of traditions in 2021, Junge is focused on creating classic designs with a contemporary twist. The brand is for the quality conscious consumer, which seeks exclusive materials while still focused on a comfortable design.

JUNK de LUXE twists the classic and timeless design of vintage garments through a fashion forward framework. The aim is to create a style suitable for multiple occasions but always providing a distinguished edge. We describe this interplay of mutually exclusive stylistic dimensions as Street Tailoring. Street Tailoring is an artistic grasp used to frame the youthful defiance of streetwear with the classic touch of sartorial tailoring. We create contemporary yet timeless garments – a contradiction that encapsulates our core identity. We place high value in providing the ideal cuts and details to each and every piece of garment.

After gathering in-depth insights from active women and their relationships with their bags, the founders of KAAI found that women are irritated by the chaos in their fashionable but often unpractical handbags, yet bored with the looks of their “masculine” work bags. In an attempt to bring practicality and sophisticated femininity together, they decided to create a new bag concept for women on the go. With an eye for detail, superior materials and a multi-purpose design, a KAAI bag not only holds your stuff: it carries your life.

KAMO International stands for the timeless artistry of product craftsmanship. Our designs are an ode to manufacturing traditions, artisan skill, and human dignity. We curate wardrobe essentials and staple items that epitomize simplicity and cleverness, destined to become cherished classics in your personal collection of goods.

Born British, raised up on the Streets of New York: Kangol today is a cultural fusion, taking the best of British heritage, the birth of Hip hop and mixing it with cutting edge street fashion. At its core, Kangol prides itself on producing innovative and quality products using many of the same techniques developed over 75 years ago when the brand was founded in Northern England in 1938 by Jacques Spreiregen – a Polish citizen. He started making berets for the English army. He made other things, too, like coffins, seat belts, and helmets (fun fact, Kangol is licensed to make shoes, clothes, even makeup in other countries), but hats are what stuck. Kangol’s unwavering commitment to its core values has garnered a unique and loyal following of fans worldwide, both young and old.Everyone has a Kangol story. Those stories typically feature a celebrity as a sartorial reference point. For the older generations, Slick Rick and The Kangol Crew; for those a little younger, Run D.M.C.; and for those even more youthful, L.L. Cool J and Missy Elliot.

Karen by Simonsen is the design driven go-to-choice for the modern bohemian minimalist. With a proud focus on sensual femininity, and a sophisticated and arty approach, the styles represent basic everyday favorites as well as outstanding showpieces. Fashion needs to be adaptable because emotions are vibrant. Many modern women often find themselves In Between Places. Constantly shifting between motherhood and career, emotional and tough, in the aftermath of post pandemic comfiness and the urge to stand out in eye-catching must-haves. It is impossible to predict which emotions a day will bring. However, with styles that embrace all feelings, it will be possible to Escape the Ordinary to Gain a New Start no matter what. Going back to the roots, Karen by Simonsen presents a wide variety of fittings, fabrics, and levels of detail. Making it possible to mix and match monochrome essentials and outstanding must-haves. All characterized by the impeccable quality, refined details, and Danish design tradition that defines Karen by Simonsen.

The house of KARL LAGERFELD shares the iconic vision and design aesthetic of its founder, Karl Lagerfeld, fused with a contemporary, forward-looking spirit. The brand celebrates his colossal legacy and breathes his passion, intuition and inexhaustible creativity into the core of its DNA. The signature KARL LAGERFELD aesthetic combines Parisian classics with a rock-chic attitude and tailored silhouettes. Its portfolio of accessible, aspirational collections includes ready-to-wear for women, men and kids, plus bags, small leather goods, eyewear, footwear, perfumes and candles.Driven by consumer engagement, KARL LAGERFELD’s immersive retail experience includes more than 200 monobrand stores worldwide, with key locations in Paris, London, Munich, Dubai and Shanghai. The brand further connects with consumers through a premium wholesale distribution network in Europe, the Middle East and Asia. The global flagship store on KARL.COM reaches 96 countries.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - retail, luxury, licensing, fragrances, leather goods, accessories, home, real estate, ready to wear, events, apparel, and design

DESCRIPTION: Developed by international athlete and skin cancer prevention activist Charlotte Jorst, Kastel is dedicated to crafting stylish, contemporary and skin-safe activewear. UPF 30 and 50 sun protection meets modern prints, saturated hues and athletic, fashion-forward silhouettes for athletes and the everyday woman alike.We search the globe for inspiration, focusing on both the fashion capitals and hidden getaways. Our highest priority is to deliver a product that is both beautiful and safe for all or your athletic endeavors. When you shop Kastel you are supporting the work of a female-operated company that has worked tirelessly to provide you with the best style, fit, comfort and protection possible.

Driven by a passion for making the outside and trades accessible for all, KEEN is a values-led, family-owned footwear brand from Portland, Oregon, committed to creating original and versatile products, enhancing lives, and inspiring adventures outside. Founded in 2003, it launched a revolution in the industry with the debut of the Newport adventure sandal. It continues to launch game-changing products and establish new performance, comfort, and design standards while actively working to Detox the Planet. The brand formalized its values commitment under the banner of The KEEN Effect. KEEN has a focus on sustainability throughout the value chain

KeriKit was born when I struggled to find the perfect bag during both my pregnancies.I wanted a versatile, unique, boutique style bag, that could be used for all of motherhood and beyond, a one bag that does it all kind of design that could switch from play dates to date nights without the need to switch bags. Nothing like this existed, so with over 25 years’ experience as a handbag designer for most of the UK high street, I realised I was right person to create the solution - so I did.
INDUSTRY: Retail - Fashion, Design, handbag design, leather expert, production and importing, Business growth, budgets, team management , brand awareness, and profit first
STREET: Hayloft House, Moorside Lane, Pott Shrigley, Macclesfield

DESCRIPTION: Kero's collections are inspired by the infinite textures and colors of traditional Peruvian crafts such as basketry, embroidery, or loom. We create versatile, unisex pieces with a contemporary design. We use top-quality alpaca yarn, produced in the heart of the Peruvian Andean highlands, and Peruvian cotton. Most of our yarns are hand-dyed in unique colors. Our threads can have up to 60 well balanced colors in a single spool. At Kero Design we work with artisan knitting machines (without electricity), electronic knitting machines, and crochet needles, paying special attention to details and hand finishes. From timeless, classic, high-quality basics to beautiful jacquards, our designers create special combinations of yarns and fibers. Many hours of work are necessary to guarantee that each product that leaves our workshops meets the quality standards required by the most demanding customers.

KIBO is a sustainable collective with a mission to reinvent the way fashion is made. Designed for comfort, our products are ethically sourced and made using a combination upcycled and natural materials. For every product sold, we donate a portion of the proceeds to alleviate modern slavery.
STREET: Block B, Sea View Estate, 2 Watson Road, Tin Hau

DESCRIPTION: KING LOUIE is quirky. And we are proud of that. We are an international women's clothing brand founded in 1984 in Amsterdam, with 1.000 points of sale across Europe. We always follow our own path, in everything we do. Colorful, even if the whole world is black and white. Cheerful, even if no one else is. Crazy about prints, even if everyone only wants plains. Not because we want to be different but to wear colorful outfits and make daring combinations. To show the world who we are. And inspire women to be themselves and do what makes them happy. We believe in fair fashion and sustainable relationships. We strive to use more sustainable materials in every collection. Almost all fabrics we use are certified. And this fall, our first circular items will be on the market. We want to do the right thing - simple as that.

Kings Of Indigo introduces: Collection Spring Summer 2024 After an eventful half year, we proudly present our new collection for Spring/Summer 2024. A fresh sustainable denim and apparel collection including new denim fits and a wide range of linen styles. The collection mixes seasonal styles and Kings Of Indigo Classics; our Royal Core Collection that’s never out of stock and always in style. Kings Of Indigo has been pioneering sustainability for more than 10 years. We create high quality pieces with a timeless design that last a lifetime. All our products are made from organic, recycled and low impact fibers, with a view to minimize their ecological footprint. Combined with our craftsmanship in denim our garments are raising the bar. ‘Doing It Right’ is our pledge. To always get our denims right. But also to do right by the planet and those we share it with.

We're a family-owned brand from Copenhagen that designs bags for everyday urban life. We create affordable, durable, and functional styles while never compromising our obligation to act with responsibility and empathy. To guide us, we work under the motto, carry kindness. We want the Earth to be thriving and be treated with respect by its inhabitants. We are doing our part by using certified recycled materials for our products. Our ambition is to be able to assess and reduce our products' impact, from raw material extraction to packaging, to transport, to end-of-life. We want a kinder and more accepting world. Therefore we're donating 1% of all sales to initiatives working to spread kindness, break down walls of prejudice and heal people who have been marginalized.

KINUA is a brand committed to sustainability, ethical production and timeless design. Each collection is designed and produced in Perú. We choose to work only with natural resources for this reason our products are made only with KINUA yarns, offering full traceability in each garment.Our products are ethically made and socially responsible and they aim to preserve ancestral textile techniques while offering a modern aesthetic. We believe in timeless fashion. For this reason rather than developing several collections per year , we develop only one, creating products that last a lifetime rather than a season.We create collections infused of botanical dyes offering  flawless sustainable biodegradable garments colored by nature created to inspire.

KIVILAI Jewellery creates finely crafted earrings, necklaces and barcelets made of silver and gold. “There is a story behind each unique piece of jewellery. I love to play around and come up with new combinations of natural materials, like feathers or vintage with precious metals. Some pieces are crafted by hand to create one of a kind jewelry.” KIVILAI Jewellery is committed to conserving resources through sustainable production. • We transform recycled materials into elegant pieces. • We craft pieces by hand to add uniqueness. • We consider eco-friendly methods in every aspect of design and packaging.

Kiwee, is a daily bag brand, ounded in 2016. We believe that every sing individual shines when he or she persists and concentrate. Ever since our first Fisherman Backpack back in 2016 that took us 14 months to develop we have been keeping on evolving in design and sustainability, exploring how you could possibly live and travel in the future.

Klint Care is a Danish skincare brand on a mission to unite art and skincare. We combine clean, vegan, and effective skincare with the beauty of art - we call this the art of skincare. We are dedicated to helping our customers take care of their skin by using only the best natural ingredients available to create a product that will bring joy and help improve skin conditions. We want to help new artists develop their profiles and get seen by a broader audience through our high-quality products. We want to help, support and grow talented artists throughout the world. Aside from the commission we pay to our artists, we enter a profit-sharing agreement so that when you buy a Klint Care product you are supporting the new generation of artists.We deeply care about the products, and all our skincare products are produced in Denmark. We only source the best ingredients and we always ensure to use the best available materials that live up to our core values.We make the products in Denmark, and we use natural ingredients that are rich in nutrients. The products are vegan, cruelty-free and the packaging is sustainable.

Klitmøller Collective is a lifestyle where ideas come from meetings, travels and gatherings through generations, bound together by the sea in and around Klitmøller. We design for people who are attracted to the raw Nordic nature. Our goal is to design and produce clothes that last, in quality materials with a sustainable approach to production, colors, materials and appearance. We design everything in Denmark and produce in Portugal near Porto in smaller factories that are often run by families. We always choose sustainable materials whenever possible - our preferred materials are mulesing free merino wool and lambswool, organic cotton, linen and lyocelll. Being a sustainable brand is not a destination, but a journey that we constantly aim to improve along the way. We feel we are on the right track, but are aware that any production affects the environment. Therefore, we strive to choose materials, production sites and packaging that have as little impact on the environment as possible. By doing so - and by doing well - we hope to inspire other brands to choose a greener path with less footprint from production.

As a brand, our inspiration comes from the great environmental challenges facing humanity. It’s really just that simple. It all comes down to being aware of the impact we have on our Earth. That the choice is ours. That it's time to take action. And that we can and need to make changes. KnowledgeCotton Apparel is not a traditional clothing company. Using business as a force for doing good has never been a question for us – it’s part of our DNA. Driving this business was always about believing that we can make a difference. And this belief has taken us far. As a company we are determined to challenge the conventions in the textile industry, to be on the lookout for new innovations and to stay true to our vision – there’s no other way going forward. Motivated by our 1969 heritage, we make clothes that take a stand. It is our mission to provide the consumer with apparel not making any compromises when it comes to style, comfort or quality. The style of Knowledge is about attitude. We are an outdoor inspired sportswear brand featuring a complete range of timeless, long-lasting utility products made for a wide range of activities. We believe in a multi-functional approach to fashion, offering a total look where casual is injected with everything from denim to fusion concepts and outdoor clothing for adventures in harmony with nature’s elements. At KnowledgeCotton Apparel, we provide the authentic alternatives. Clothes to follow the user through all happenings of life. Always rest assured that a piece carrying our trademark, the owl, meets the highest requirements in quality and third party certifications. True to our spirit of tomorrow.

Since 2015 we are producing sustainable sneaker at Komrads. But the more we became aware of the production process the more questions we had about the Fashion industry.So, we started wondering: how polluting is the fashion industry, What about the Rana Plaza disaster and the numerous sweatshops. And what about all these youngsters going on strike for a better world! And so, this was the starting point of our dream. A dream to produce a fashionable sneaker that did not cause harm to our planet. A Sneaker where did not have to harvest natural commodities. A sneaker build entirely from re-used and recycled materials, A dream to be part of the circular economy. A dream to design a the most sustainable and ecological sneaker.

Kirsten Krog specialise in luxury plus size occasion wear that exudes the highest standards of quality. Show-stopping occasion wear with a fantastic fit has earned Kirsten Krog a well deserved following in the industry and their fabulous designs are the perfect choice for those times you need an eye-catching outfit that is comfortable as well as flattering. Fresh and vibrant styles will always be found in Kirsten Krog's plus size clothing range so if you're looking for something new you've come to the right place!

KROON 02 is a Luxembourgish accessories brand founded by two sisters Laurene and Charlotte Kroon. KROON 02 is heavily influenced by their childhood experiences. Roaming empty fields, summers spent sailing with the family and making perfume with flower petals from the garden. However the brand is not only about memories, it is about creating memories. About embracing the inner child, about encouraging the curious, the experimental and about feeling the beauty in the simple things.
Icelandic menswear brand built on experience and passion for heritage clothing.

Since 1986, KUNA has been characterized by developing the finest alpaca and vicuna garments. Over time, we have improved our knowledge about these marvelous fibers and have achieved new blends by combining natural fibers such as organic cotton, linen, and silk with Alpaca. Today, Kuna is recognized as an iconic Peruvian brand in sustainable fashion. Our garments not only meet the highest quality standards but also reflect a philosophy of respect for the environment and the Andean communities. We actively participate in different projects that aim to improve knowledge, development, and communities that share the same lifestyle. Each year, Kuna launches two main collections: Fall/Winter and Spring/Summer. Additionally, we offer capsule collections with exclusive pieces made from unique fibers such as Black Alpaca, Royal Silk, Royal Alpaca, and Vicuna.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - Luxury Goods, Alpaca and Vicuna Garments, Prendas de Alpaca y Vicuña, and Prendas de lujo

DESCRIPTION: Stand out with a smart colourful touch to express your own story, mood and values. Designed for all activities, La Boucle is the only belt you need wherever you travel.Founded in 2018 on Kickstarter by a group of optimistic dreamers, La Boucle is a leading European brand for flexible & premium belts. Our young, enthusiastic and international team operates from our beautiful headquarters in Brussels, Belgium, where we focus on nurturing talent and enabling each team member to excel in creativity, marketing, design, sales and innovation. Our product sells in over 600 premium fashion stores worldwide. What's more, for every belt we sell, a tree is planted.

Beautiful Today... Beautiful Tomorrow. We make fashion that makes women feel confident, positive, inspired, feminine and beautiful. Yet, we not only want to make women feel beautiful today but also confident about the fact that their choice of fashion is creating a better tomorrow. We believe in creating fewer original products with a long-lasting quality as well as aesthetic and furthermore with a focus on circularity, upcycling and repurposing.

LA FENICE is a Polish brand and manufacturer of leather clothing. For 30 years we have been sharing our love for fashion. In our store www.lafenice.store you will find men's and women's leather jackets, coats and much more.

Welcome to LA RŌUGE - where fashion meets diversity and celebrate the beauty in all shapes and sizes! Our mission is to create clothing that makes every woman feel confident, comfortable, and beautiful. This by combining simple designs, natural qualities, and a high level of finish with a commercial mindset. We are focusing on making saleable styles with four longterms collections. Furthermore, we have smaller express drops within the season with new styles designed based on the current trends!

The word LABRUM is a latin term for ‘having an edge’, and this sits at the heart of the brand’s mission – to make honest, practical clothing rooted in simplicity, fit and a passion for detail. Driven by a desire to create looks that are wearable yet idiosyncratic, and inspired by a lifetime of travel, exploration and pilgrimage. Labrum London delivers innovative garments with an uncompromising commitment to quality and design. A utilitarian approach fused with British tailoring and a touch of West Africa creates a design recipe that is clean, sophisticated and unique.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - Menswear Clothing

DESCRIPTION: DAILY DAY BY LAGOFRA is a Portuguese brand and clothing manufacturer. We design, manufacture and market our garments. Our journey spans three generations, honoring our traditions, respecting our present and committed to our collective future. We appreciate being part of a small universe of brands that run their own factories. We love having people working with us for a long time. With our suppliers the goal is the same, long relationships. We look at the design as something distinct: knowing to combine it with functionality and longevity is the key to create unique items which are an alternative to the fast fashion market.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - Clothing production
STREET: Rua do Complexo Industrial Monte das Devesas, 36

DESCRIPTION: With the founder's roots deeply connected to the coastal town of Mombasa, Kenya, laidback london is dedicated to creating artisan-made products using natural materials. Working with local artisans and preserving generational craftsmanship, the brand offers small collections of timeless classics that get better with age. From the iconic handmade beaded leather sandals that debuted in London's Portobello Market in 2002 to our expanding winter collection, each creation reflects our commitment to vibrant cultural influence, craftsmanship and sustainability.

It all began 1999 with an idea. The idea to produce fashion garments under fair conditions, to create beautiful items and to feel good about doing it. This has continued to be our vision up to the present day, and for the last 20 years we have been combining premium quality materials with sophisticated design.We are continuously evolving from season to season because we embrace sustainability as a holistic process. We never use any chemicals that could be harmful to health, we procure our materials from organic farmers, we use eco-friendly transportation concepts and we compensate all the CO2 we produce. LANIUS – who we are. A Cologne-based family-run business. Claudia Lanius is the founder and designer of the LANIUS label, as well as a German sustainable fashion pioneer. Together with her daughter, Annabelle Homann, they develop motivating visions for the company’s future.

Launched in 2002 as a swimwear and lingerie brand in the Otto Group, LASCANA has become Germany´s #1 swimwear brand and is now a top player in all categories of women‘s apparel. The LASCANA Brand Group hosts a strong portfolio of private and license brands to offera versatile assortment range. We focus on curating collections that drive profitable business through outstanding quality to price ratio and great fit combined with compelling designs as well as operational excellence, with our experience in production, logistics and replenishment. We believe in building strong, long-term relationships with our partners, so we can grow together. Become part of our worldwide multichannel network! YOUR SUCCESS IS OUR SUCCESS.

Laundry lab creates conscious wardrobe staples by providing shapes & colors that last for years while not being bounded by trends. Our collection is made for a wide range of women seeking comfortable, yet elegant styles that are easy to combine on a day to day basis. The idea is pretty simple: empowering women to seek comfort in their body & style by bringing high quality designs at a fair price.

Lavinde Copenhagen is the result of both a private and professional partnership between Cecilie Svendsen Vinde og Fillip Løwén Nielsen. Our brand is based on a love for quality, design, and clean raw materials. At Lavinde Copenhagen you will only find products that have been developed through testing, time, presence, passion, and quality assurance. Our certifications are your guarantee that we keep our word when we say we care about your health. For us, quality equals pure raw materials. And therefore, Lavinde Copenhagen is not a place where you settle. Here you simply get the best for you and your skin - both in terms of raw materials, quality, and results.

Le Coq Sportif is a French sportswear and sports equipment manufacturing company based in Entzheim. Founded in 1882 by Émile Camuset, the company first issued items branded with its now-famous rooster trademark in 1948.

Le Galion is a traditional brand that has become one of France's most respected perfume houses since its inception in 1930. Paul Vacher's fragrances won the hearts of ladies and stylish gentlemen alike, particularly during the 1950s, when the French perfume industry was at its peak.
STREET: AETHER PARFUM 18 rue Sainte Croix de la Bretonnerie

DESCRIPTION: With passion and focus on tops and sweaters, LeComte realizes a new and modern lifestyle. Natural, feminine and sporty – the collections from LeComte manage to mix styles in a fantastic way, have a perfect fit and high quality. The garments are decorated with a relaxed yet sophisticated style, never opulent or overburdened – that’s LeComte!

Lee Jeans is backed by over 125 years of purposeful design and craftsmanship, Lee’s® movement-inspired innovations, versatile styling and superior fit continue to inspire generations of brand loyalists. Lee® is an iconic American denim and casual apparel brand that has been purposefully designing clothing to inspire you to live a life in motion. Driven by core values of authenticity, integrity and drive, the brand creates products consumers love. Lee's® collections include a uniquely styled range of jeans, pants, shirts, shorts and jackets for both girls and boys.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - Denim and Street Fashion and Lifestyle

DESCRIPTION: Elevated apparel built for the modern athlete. Founded in 2019, Legends is an athlete-owned performance and lifestyle apparel brand based in Los Angeles, CA. With an ownership group that includes Quavo, Baker Mayfield, Matt Barnes, Marcus & Markieff Morris, Steve Nash, Larry Nance Jr. as well as many other athletes and celebrities; Legends blends sports, entertainment, and culture with streetwear-inspired design; creating a product that is built for the modern athlete.

Legero produces women's shoes with lots of love and years of experience with the brand promise that feet love legero. Incredible lightness, timeless design and an incomparable wearing comfort from morning to evening, suitable for every occasion – at an affordable price. In 2019, legero sold over one million pairs of shoes. The most important focus markets are the DACH region, Italy and Sweden, with steady expansion into other markets. legero is a brand of legero united, based in Graz. For our autumn collection we have been inspired by the interplay of nature. Made with decades of experience and made from the highest quality materials, our new models are timelessly down-to-earth and light at the same time. And they inspire their wearers to conquer every situation and every day with ease.

Lemon Jelly's rain boots might be their heart, but there's so much more to discover about the brand! Founded, designed, and produced in Portugal since 2013, Lemon Jelly is part of the Procalçado group, a Portuguese footwear brand with over 40 years of experience. With its signature lemon scent, Lemon Jelly shoes are created from durable, recycled and animal-friendly materials.

Leveté Room is our studio and creative space. This is where all collections have their origin. Our name is pronounced Levity – lightness of mind. The headquarter in Hellerup north of Copenhagen, is designed as a home, in which Leveté Rooms modern, timeless and elegant universe and refined genuine products come together. The Leveté woman is feminine and not afraid to play with elegant and tailored elements from the mens wardrobe. She effortlessly mixes soft, drapy and transparent tops with a pair of tailored trousers. Rooted in the Nordic and inspired by travelling to Paris, she is a proud and presentable woman with character.

Levinsky is a fur wholesale company and was established in 1869. Levinsky has throughout the years, taken great pride in selecting the finest skins, for production of our luxurious collection, which we design in cooperation with our personal designers. This secures our customer a unique, high Quality garment, at every purchase. We make vests and coats of many fur types. Mink, Silver fox, Blue fox, Rex Rabbit, Seal and Finn raccoon. Levinsky is known worldwide for our special selected double face collection. Every year we provide our customer with new fashionable styles and exciting colors with different types of fur trims. Levinsky is located in Copenhagen, Denmark and we exhibit our collection at the largest fairs worldwide each year.

Our company started in the 1960’s with the goal of offering belt designs, accessories and shoes of the highest leather quality. All our designs are made with the outmost care, fashioned with a unique work style and using the best and most luxurious materials. To make them, we combine exclusive design and respect for craftsman tradition. In other words, each one of our designs is handmade. Over time and in response to market demand, LEYVA has developed several collections to meet the needs of all types of customers and to preserve its place in the tough and ever-changing world of fashion. The fusion of perseverance, excellent workmanship and personalized customer service has become the trademark of this family-owned firm.

Liberté Essentiel is a young Danish fast fashion female brand with 12 yearly drops. We offer both flash fashion styles and stockbased basic lines. Our huge succes the ALMA series is a super soft jersey quality that exist in several styles and will be refeshed monthly in new colors and prints. We offer great entry price articles with high volume mark ups.

Liebly is a Danish Accessory Brand offering high quality products with a contemporary yet classic look. We cherish colors and prints, and we create a wide range of hair accessories for the modern and fashion conscious women. The Brand has excisted since 2019 and was in 2023 taken over by Julie Bove and Tine Hertz, who renamed the Brand Liebly. Since then Liebly has grown to be an international womens fashion accessory brand represented across Europe. We care a lot about our qualities and only produce in the best and most environmental friendly materials. We design all products ourselves and we care for every little detail in the creative process, leaving our range with a distinguished and exclusive touch.

LIND is a sturdy Danish design that emphasizes excellent qualities, sharp details, and a beautiful finish. We produce knitwear in organic cotton, merino wool, and cashmere. In our collections, we also offer t-shirts, blouses, and shirts in viscose and linen, produced in Europe. We place a strong emphasis on quality and a good fit. Our design is unique and stylish. We present four collections annually, offering both deliveries within 4-6 weeks and longer-term deliveries. The collections are developed here in Denmark, and with reliable suppliers, we strive to achieve a luxurious and distinctive product. On our website, you can shop online, find inspiration in fashion trends, and contact us to locate the nearest LIND retailer.
INDUSTRY: Retail - Womenswear, Accessories, and Personal Shopping

DESCRIPTION: Lindbergh is a men’s fashion brand that provides a solution to modern fashion in timeless & authentic styles, designed as modern wardrobe staples and long-lasting quality in mind.
INDUSTRY: Textile Manufacturing - Visual Display Design, Designer Menswear & Apparel, Social Media Marketing, and Menswear & Apparel Influencer Campaigns

DESCRIPTION: Lindenmann moves into new business premises in Lochäckerstraße in Pforzheim. The 3-storey building in Kronprinzenstraße became too small. Lindenmann acquires the licence for Pierre Cardin belts. The first collection is launched in July. Another milestone for the expansion was set. Lindenmann takes account of the trend towards sustainably produced products. We meet the growing demand for environmentally friendly, high-quality and durable products through new alliances with selected tanneries that are certified for leather processing with natural tanning agents without chemicals.There, HANDCRAFT is traditionally written in capital letters: this is how the “HANDCRAFTED SELECTION” came into being. Lindenmann switches to electric mobility. Half of the vehicles are now powered exclusively by electricity. Another step towards preserving an environment worth living in.

A fun story SINCE 2006 From launching in 2006 with full collections, we offers an effortless wardrobe for all women and her busy lifestyle. Line Of Oslo is all about design made to last. Garments she can easily dress up and down, in multiple ways, and complement all women's shapes and sizes. With a focus on sustainable & comfortable quality garments, the clothes follow our vision;

B2B masculine fashion brand specialised in design, manufacture and retail of men's suits. Our experience, initiative and capabilities have made us a benchmark in the Spanish textile sector for the manufacture, production and retail distribution of men's clothing. Passion, versatility, integrity and loyalty are the pillars of our work. Based on them, we carve out excellence in each new collection and guarantee timeless designs aligned with the needs of our central driving force: the final customer. More than 30 years of experience guarantee that we weave bonds of professionalism and trust from the first button to the last thread.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - Sector textil, Moda masculina, Trajes caballero, Trajes hombre, B2B, España, Tallas grandes, Plus size, Trajes de ceremonia, and Retail

DESCRIPTION: Sportswear Company Since 1954

Liu Jo is an Italian brand established in the mid-1990s in Carpi, a knitwear manufacturing hub known for its excellence. It is the brainchild of Marco Marchi who fueled it with his vision for a brand embodying contemporary,identity-driven, and liberating fashion geared at celebrating feminine beauty through women’s empowerment. Building its foundation on creativity and the quintessentially Italian flair for intuition, the company has telegraphed its identity through clothing, accessories, footwear and jewelry, conveying a contemporary and highly recognizable lifestyle. Across the years Liu Jo has remained true to its original vision continuously aiming - and even more sotoday - to act as a loudspeaker for important values such as freeself-expression, sharing a contemporary, identity-driven fashion statement and conveying its own idea of beauty. Liu Jo is currently available in 45 countries through a distribution network comprising over 280 flagship stores and around 5,000 multi-brand retailers worldwide.

Liviana Conti is present on the market ever since 30 years. The founder, Mrs. Liviana Troffei, gained the spotlight as the queen of inventive knitting, renowned for her relevant, meticulous approach to details, patterns and geometric lines. Over time the brand has maintained and strenghtened this distinctiveness, enriching it with the development of a total look collection: research and experimentation with innovative and exclusive materials are the main assets. It’s a modern minimalism that becomes «effortless chic», for a discrete and not flamboyant fashion, suitable for self-aware consumers.

LIVINGOODIES is a Danish lifestyle company developing, designing and EU-producing unique furnitures concentrated on craftsmanship and sustainability. The development is based upon need and relevance, the design is based upon comfort and internalization and the production is based upon the environment and proximity. All furnitures and accessories are or can be tailer-made to any home, shop, restaurant, hotel or office.

LLOYD Men's Belts have prided themselves on exclusive men's belts for over 100 years. Belts are not only practical. Useful. Functional. They are part of a man's most basic equipment. They are perhaps his most important accessory. A belt shows who or what a man is. A sophisticated man helps himself to LLOYD Men's Belts collections, because he puts the highest value on the very best materials, and on an individual, creative design. LLOYD Men's Belts are unique. This exclusiveness doesn't just have to be seen. It also has to be handled. You can experience it. Sense it. Feel it. Even the material has to satisfy strict selection criteria. Only through the processing can a small work of art be made from raw materials – carving out the pure materials exactly that which represents their class and uniqueness. In LLOYD Men's Belts, this still mainly happens in the handiwork. Therefore the high-quality workmanship. The wealth of detail. And the beauty of the final product.

LLOYD Shoes GmbH has stood for the highest quality in the production of men's and women's shoes since 1888.  The attention to detail, the constant pursuit of further development and the implementation of the latest innovations make LLOYD an attractive company for both customers and qualified employees.  LLOYD shoes are unmistakable thanks to their trademark, the world-famous red stripe.  The company, under the management of Andreas Schaller and Jörg Wetzel, employed an average of 1,500 people in 2021, of which 408 were in Germany.  In the 2020 financial year, the company recorded consolidated sales of around €83 million.  The LLOYD company was founded in Bremen in 1888 and has had its headquarters in Sulingen since 1942. The brand is currently undergoing an exciting and dynamic transformation process that is driven by topics such as D2C, casualization, sustainability and customer centricity.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - Men's shoes, women's shoes, bags, leather jackets, and accessories

DESCRIPTION: LLOYD Shoes GmbH has stood for the highest quality in the production of men's and women's shoes since 1888.  The attention to detail, the constant pursuit of further development and the implementation of the latest innovations make LLOYD an attractive company for both customers and qualified employees.  LLOYD shoes are unmistakable thanks to their trademark, the world-famous red stripe.  The company, under the management of Andreas Schaller and Jörg Wetzel, employed an average of 1,500 people in 2021, of which 408 were in Germany.
