DESCRIPTION: Lola Cruz is a sustainable and responsible spanish designer brand, that creates sophisticated premium women shoes for their real lives. Lola Cruz is a strong woman who encourage a way of living, an infinite passion. She represents sensuality and sophistication. A woman who loves fashion but doesn't forget the essence and attitude that make it unique. Combining a trendy design with impeccable luxury craftsmanship to create must-have shoes. Creations that inspire authenticity, evolution, freedom and femininity.
STREET: Parque Tecnológico Paterna - Calle Charles Darwin 28

DESCRIPTION: Based in Copenhagen, Lollys Laundry was founded in 2007 in response to a desire to create a wardrobe that takes you from a day at the office to a night out, from beach party to festival. A wardrobe that offers you strong basic styles, colourful prints and quirky details that add that little something extra. In short, a wardrobe designed for life as it unfolds, giving you a sense of freedom to do whatever you feel like. Getting dressed should be easy, or, to be more precise, hassle-free. That's why we go to great lengths to create clothes you won't even have to think about once you're dressed.

We deliver fashion with high speed to the market, with small collections every month, and with high profit. Our collections reflect the trends of the time. All for immediate delivery. We offer a 3 – 4 mark up to our customers. Our Mark-up combined with a high sell-through rate and unique design makes us your new perfect match. We deliver four annual trends – but they are placed in drops -meaning you’ll get a shipment every month. You buy “in season”. So you don’t have to forecast what’s trending six months ahead.

Love Lolita is for the free spirits, sun seekers and dream chasers. Inspired by the need for luxe bohemian, chic and feminin pieces, offering everyday and statement pieces that are current and timeless. The two best friends, Alethe Marie Helten and Marte Madeleine Mosand, have worked together in the fashion business for seven years running their own fashion agency and fashion store. After years of searching for the perfect affordable dresses, they decided to launch Love Lolita in 2019.

Luhta has its roots in the northern forests and nature. Building on more than a century of experience, Luhta manufactures men and women clothing and footwear for all seasons. By skilfully combining heritage and present-day knowledge, Luhta creates classic and stylish products and novelties for both active and relaxed leisure time.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - Sportswear, Fashionwear, Home decoration, Motorcyclingwear, Clothing, Footwear, Apparel, and Pet products

DESCRIPTION: Luna Moon Studios is all about capturing the essence of European culture and blending it with contemporary designs to create products that are both stylish and functional. Our are a reflection of the vibrancy and energy that can be found in some of the most charming destinations. At Luna Moon Studios, we take great joy in fabricating fashion-forward creations that seamlessly merge aesthetics with functionality, designed to navigate your active day-to-day life.

LYKKELAND ateliér, Flattering and soft essentiels, designed to empower and embrace EVERYbory regardless of size, shape and colour. The label was founded in Copenhagen, Denmark 2022 by danish creative designer Heidie Lykke. The line consists of loungewear, pyjama wear and shapewear. and is the perfect mix between comfort, function and fashion, you won’t want to take off. The designs and colours are timeless, crafted from supreme qualities to stand the test of time and last beyond season. We use natural and sustainable materials, produced with responsible manufactores, because they feel best to wear, they last longer and are better for the environment. Among other materials, we use organic cotton, LENZING Tencel, Lyocell and bamboo. Production takes place mainly in Europe. The brand disrupt the usual fashion cycle in favor of considered CORE Items and releases, each comprising the building blocks of a capsule wardrobe.

Lyle & Scott is a privately owned British Menswear Brand, with a rich 149 year history crafting high-quality knitwear. We pride ourselves in our authentic approach to design, our rich heritage and expertise, and our continued commitment to quality and innovation. Our business comprises a strong wholesale portfolio of key accounts throughout the World, licensing within Japan, while also selling directly to our customers through our retail stores and Ecommerce website. We are devoted to designing collections that enhance our customers lifestyle around the clock, comprising menswear, fitness, golf and kids-wear collections We continually strive to improve and upscale our collections each season, and thus we are obsessed with the details that go into our products and make our collections versatile
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - Menswear, Knitwear, Womenswear, Sportswear, Footwear, Accessories, and Boyswear
STREET: 37 Kentish Town Road, Camden Town, London

DESCRIPTION: Maanesten is a Danish jewelry and accessory brand inspired by spirituality and designed with originality. We are captivated by the magic and wonder of nature, constantly drawing inspiration from the organic shapes and visions of our natural surroundings. By selecting the most beautiful, powerful stones in our jewelry, each piece is created to enhance your talents and energies. Maanesten’s jewelry and accessories are for everybody. Our philosophy is to have a fun, playful time expressing who you are regardless of gender and age with the love of quality pieces. Our jewelry is made in recycled sterling silver and with 18-karat gold plating at our workshop in Jaipur, India. In addition, we’re proud of our diamond collections created in 18-karat gold set with natural diamonds.
INDUSTRY: Retail Luxury Goods and Jewelry - Smykker, Øresmykker, Armsmykker, Ringe, Ear cuff, Halssmykker, and Tøj & accessories

DESCRIPTION: For nearly four decades, M·A·C COSMETICS has solidified its position as the ultimate authority in colour, embracing artistry as our foundation, championing inclusion and diversity as our essence, and placing conscious beauty and social responsibility at the forefront of our mission.

WE ARE A GLOBAL COLLECTIVE UNITED TO LEAD INNOVATION, PUSHING THE DENIM INDUSTRY BOUNDARIES THROUGH TECHNOLOGY, TRANSPARENCY, AND CREATIVITY. MADH WAS FOUNDED IN SWEDEN 2023 WITH THE AIM OF CHALLENGING THE TRADITIONAL WAY HOW A BRAND IS BUILT AND COLLECTIONS PRESENTED. WE USE TECHNOLOGY AND INNOVATION TO ENGAGE THE USER AND CREATE RESPONSIBLE PRODUCTION. MADH IS A SUSTAINABLE FASHION DENIM BRAND DESIGNED TO CREATE A NEW REALITY FOR DENIM. OUR UNIQUE PARTNERSHIP WITH INDUSTRY EXPERTS ALL THROUGH THE SUPPLY CHAIN, FROM FIBER TO GARMENT, CREATES COLLECTIVE INTELLIGENCE AND THE HIGHEST QUALITY GARMENTS.

Founded in 1986, Mads Nørgaard – Copenhagen is a fashion brand driven by art, culture, and the freedom to be yourself. Our mantra is: What you wear should support you in your ways and beliefs. We present masculine and feminine wear alongside seasonless Made in Denmark knitwear and the #101 striped t-shirt. The company is a proud member of the Fair Wear Foundation.

Established in 2020 in the small town Halmstad located in Sweden, MAGGIORE has quickly risen as a beacon in the Scandinavian fashion world. Born from a vision to redefine the role of caps in fashion, our brand has since expanded its horizons well beyond traditional headwear. Best known for our caps, our range has evolved to include clothing and more accessories, each crafted with a commitment to quality and an eye for style. Our standout Limited Edition caps, adorned with unique imagery inspired by iconic celebrities from the 50s and 70s, exemplify our ability to blend historical allure with contemporary fashion. Each MAGGIORE product is a tribute to the classics while embracing a modern aesthetic that appeals to the style-conscious young man. We aim to be more than just a brand; we are a symbol of exclusivity and high-quality design. Our dedication to premium materials and attention to detail sets us apart. At the CIFF fashion trade show 2024, we will showcase our latest collection. We invite all attendees to experience how MAGGIORE merges Scandinavian minimalism with global influences to create something both innovative and timeless. Visit our booth for a fashion experience that defines both today's and tomorrow's trends.

MAGNAFIED clogs and sandals are handmade using non-toxic, eco-friendly materials, the best of components and carefully selected unique and high-quality deadstock fabrics. Designed for ultimate comfort, flexibility, and durability each pair is built for everyday wear.

Designed and crafted in Spain, Magnanni is a family-owned and operated business since 1954, deeply rooted in its heritage and shoemaking traditions. Each pair of Magnanni shoes is a testament to the enduring value of hand craftsmanship. Nestled in Spain’s La Mancha Region, our brand is known for its exceptional materials and intricate hand-painted patinas, breathing a contemporary twist into classic designs. Every aspect of our operation, from design and procurement to production and distribution, is meticulously overseen by a family member. As we celebrate our 70th anniversary in 2024, this milestone signifies seven decades of consistently delivering high-quality footwear. Expanding horizons, Magnanni proudly introduces a captivating women's line, extending its footprint of superior craftsmanship and style, exemplifying our commitment to innovation and elegance as we embark on the next phase of our journey.
INDUSTRY: Retail - Mens Shoes, Shoes, Dress Shoes, Belts, Craftsmanship, Design, Quality, Womens Shoes, Luxury goods, Stitching, and Artesano

DESCRIPTION: French label developed with innovation. Maison Albē is a quest for meaning. Research has a fundamental question. How to create beauty today without betraying tomorrow...We produce products without keeping pace with the trend. Our inspirations are nomadic, tribal and above all solar. We believe that beauty lies in everything and that everything can be worn. Only the drape counts, because it is what gives confidence to the woman who wears ALBē.

The Maja Brix label is founded on two core values: Ambitious sustainability and strong conceptual design. One of the pioneering Danish labels to work across seasons and with a sustainable and ethical strategy. And a favourite among a remarkable crowd of leading Danish artists, architects, creatives and intellectuals. Since 2016 Maja Brix has released one style – or a series of styles – at a time and selected styles from all the years shapes the permanent collection shown at CIFF today. The design is simple, considered, raw, modern, and elegant. It addresses subjects such as gender, social equality and tradition and works towards less waste, less over-production and less environmental damage in the industry. Maja Brix is a slow fashion, non-seasonal, made to order label that sources consciously. The collection is made from good quality, already exiting, deadstock, recycled or organic materials and is designed for longevity using less trimmings and zero-waste pattern cutting. Like a wardrobe the collection is a living organism that changes naturally over time.

Our founder, Amanda Panahi, has years of experience as a buyer for one of the biggest retailers in the world. She always found herself being on the hunt for those beautiful holiday attires but felt that there was a huge gap in the market. Seeing how she continuously struggled to find breathable, quality pieces the idea of MandiBreeze was born and set into motion. A premium resort wear brand, based in the heart of Stockholm, with “La Lumière” as the first collection. “La Lumière” is a nod to the Mediterranean with focus on the blue and white colour scheme and is a great reflection of the core of the brand. The mission of our brand is to cater to all your summer capsule wardrobe needs – often with a delightful twist. Selectively chosen garments, handcrafted details and timeless sustainable pieces that hug you in just the right places. Our focus has been on the simple and chic, pattern and details that stand the test of time and honors that beautiful feminine silhouette.So here we are. Doing what we love, with all that we strive to be. Bridging those gaps, looking madly forward to that long-awaited summer breeze and dancing late until the sun sets - head to toe in stunning flowy fashion.

mansted is a carefully crafted knitwear brand known for its emphasis on quality. we prioritize the use of pure, soft materials and create flattering, comfortable shapes with distinctive knitwear details. discover the unique charm of the new mansted collection, with its vibrant colors and exclusive patterns.
INDUSTRY: Apparel & Fashion - Knitwear, Outdoor fashion, Specializing in knitwear, and Original windproof knitwear

DESCRIPTION: MANTLE is the Scandinavian skincare sensation transforming skin and the way we see beauty. With clean + clinical formulas and an empowering narrative, MANTLE creates award-winning products that highlight personal expression and honour your right to age. MANTLE was founded in 2020 by tech innovator Josefin Landgård and branding expert Stina Lönnkvist after they grew tired of the ageist rhetoric surrounding skincare. By fusing clean ingredients with high-performing actives in their Swedish laboratory, MANTLE creates award-winning products that highlight individual expression and honour your right to age.
INDUSTRY: Retail Health and Personal Care Products

DESCRIPTION: Marc Cain is a globally operating premium brand for women's fashion with its own production facilities in Germany. The highest standards of design, quality, materials, the latest processing techniques and fit combined with great attention to detail are the credo. Since 1973, the collections have fused a sense of aesthetics and art with nonchalance and naturalness, innovative thinking and exclusivity. At Marc Cain, we consider the collection as the star. These are divided into the sub-labels Marc Cain Collections, Marc Cain Sports, Marc Cain Essentials, Marc Cain Additions and Marc Cain Pants. The core label Collections mixes contemporary, attractive silhouettes with playful details characterising an expressive look. Sports is unconventional casual wear for every day: easy, sporty, full of joie de vivre. Marc Cain Essentials embody timeless classics reinterpreted and Marc Cain Additions are add-ons of bestsellers and important individual pieces for the trade. Marc Cain Pants offers the perfect-fitting trousers for every occasion and every silhouette.

MARCO TOZZI is a women's shoe brand of MARCO TOZZI Shoes GmbH & Co. KG, a company of the Wortmann Group based in Detmold. High-quality women's shoes are the brand's main business segment, along with the growing share of fashionable accessories and handbags. The collections contain everything a woman's heart desires. The latest shoe trends - from young fashion to classically elegant to sporty and comfortable. MARCO TOZZI is an interpretation of international trends with its own style and class. With six to eight collections per year and additional current programmes, MARCO TOZZI offers its customers the opportunity to dispose of both a basic assortment for the long term and the current trends of the season at short notice. In addition to the latest women's shoe models, which appear seasonally for spring/summer and autumn/winter, MARCO TOZZI also sells its own handbag collection, which is coordinated with the respective women's shoe collection.

MARELLA is an Italian fashion brand founded in 1971 within the Max Mara Fashion Group. It offers a creative and versatile selection that is both premium quality and accessible and allows women to express their personalities and feel like themselves in any situation. The Marella style has always complemented the beauty and femininity of the women it is made for because it knows them inside out and has never stopped listening to them. Self-aware and determined women, yet capable of light- heartedness and sensuality; women with eclectic personalities who are impossible to define. A multifaceted and changing female identity lies at the heart of the brand’s philosophy: IN WOMEN WE TRUST is the brand manifesto since 2022. More than a claim, the message is evolving into an integrated one as the foundation DNA of the brand.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - Abbigliamento, Moda, Luxury, Fashion, Accessori, e-commerce, Retail, and Technology

DESCRIPTION: We design, produce and trade jewellery and services that compliments style expressions across the beautiful and vast palette of people. Our medium is precious metals and lab-grown stones sourced responsibly, designed with passion and created with quality, longevity and circularity in focus. We offer progressive piercing services and jewellery to enable people to feel positive empowerment.
INDUSTRY: Luxury Goods & Jewelry - Handcrafted Jewellery, Fine Jewellery, Jewellery, and fashion jewellery

DESCRIPTION: Marimekko is a Finnish lifestyle design company renowned for its original prints and colors. The company’s product portfolio includes high-quality clothing, bags and accessories as well as home décor items ranging from textiles to tableware. ​ ​ When Marimekko was founded in 1951, its unparalleled printed fabrics gave it a strong and unique identity the brand is still recognized for today.

The journey behind the brand Building a brand is a journey and, as with all journeys, each and every stop is as important as the destination. Every single place I have visited has built my conception of the Marina V woman, a blend of all the women I have encountered in my travels. Departing from Athens, I explored all the major fashion capitals of the world including London, Hong Kong, Milan, Rome & Paris. Each of these places fuelled my mission to cater to the contemporary woman, combining versatility, uniqueness and uncompromising quality. London taught me freedom of expression. Hong Kong broadened my perceptions of what style is. Milan refined my tastes and provided me with creative stimuli, as did Rome with her breath-taking culture and history. Paris, however, was the ultimate destination; the global hub of fashion, the city of lights and lovers and above all, the origin of my vision to create Marina V.

Mark Buxton Perfumes is an independent perfume creation house founded by Mark Buxton in 2008. His daring handwriting was discovered when he created the first Comme des Garçons Fragrance. Now, he made perfumes for niche brands such as Le labo, Parfums d’Orsay and Oddity. Maybe you will be next?
INDUSTRY: Personal Care Product Manufacturing - Luxury Fragrance, Niche perfumery, and Perfume creator
STREET: 12, Rue du Bouquet de Longchamp, Paris

DESCRIPTION: Designer Mark Kenly Domino Tan launched his eponymous brand in 2014 after developing his craft in International fashion houses Dior, Balenciaga and Alexander McQueen. He set out to create vibrant and refined collections founded on tailoring, construction, and fine textiles. Impeccable quality and craftsmanship are at the heart and soul of the Mark Kenly Domino Tan aesthetic.The tailored Atelier collections, made according to the couture tradition, can be found in the adjacent design studio in central Copenhagen.

Mark’s passion is bold and his determination and expertise in footwear is a force to be reckoned with. He is a true footwear industry veteran with over 25 years of design experience behind him. He is the executive vice president of Southern California-based Skechers. In 2000, Mark created a couture line, to expose people to the creativity that’s within Skechers’ four walls. He launched a signature Mark Nason collection onto the fashion scene with an edgy boots-driven line inspired by rock ‘n’ roll. The collection was crafted in Italy with premium materials and elaborate detail, and worn by some of the biggest musicians and bands. Still devoted to the same philosophies, the signature label has reemerged nearly a decade later. Mark’s desire for a premium collection of footwear still holds true. He continues to bring the same passion for craftsmanship and art of making footwear to every style in the line.Today, Mark Nason Skechers is a trend right collection of modern looks with unique materials and styling for men and women. Take hold and enjoy the ride.

At Markberg, we believe in quality. We put our all into designing products you will be able to use for many years to come. Gorgeous items you won’t just throw away after a short period of time. We never compromise ‒ it’s simply not in our nature.

MARTA DU CHÂTEAU was founded with the vision, that the brand should provide cool fashion at a resonable price. The inspiration for the collections are gathered from the French and Italian fashion scene. The fashion scene is ever changing, therefore we feel that the old longterm preorder system that have been a major part of the fashion business forever is dead. We are an expres company, what you order today, we deliver to your shop the day after. We believe this is the future. We want to deliver cool fashion for all, therefore our styles are designed so they fit all kind of wonderful women regardless of style or size. Because we work as an express company, we design our collection close to the season, and therefor we have a good chance of having the seasons must haves at the best possible price in all the right colors, exactly when You need it, not 6 months later. Tex-Time which is the founding company of MARTA DU CHÂTEAU have been in the express business for many years, and therefore knows what it takes to be a success today, and also tomorrow. We believe in building long term relationships with our customers, and we are sure that if You call us or visit us in our showroom in either Herning or Copenhagen, You will definetly feel welcome, and hopefully see all the good things MARTA DU CHÂTEAU can do for your shop.
MASKA is a design-oriented contemporary gift wrapping concept store from Dubai. We introduce art and elegance into packaging, making your gifts significantly memorable.

Massimo Santini represents an emblem in the world of footwear. The brand was born in 1979 in the heart of the Marche region, the epicenter of the production of this precious accessory, thanks to the entrepreneurial dynamism and foresight of Emilio, founder of the company. The refined creations of Santini shoes have subsequently conquered Northern Europe and Asia, thanks to Massimo, Emilio's son-in-law. He was able to create a shoe that wraps the foot like a glove, a distinctive feature of some lines of the collections. The brand's reputation and its presence on the international stage have further solidified under the leadership of brothers Luca and Andrea, who represent of the third generation at the helm of the company. Massimo Santini collections materialize in a harmonious balance between tradition and progress, the result of innovative research combined with the expertise of craftsmanship and the excellence of Made in Italy. With a variety of versatile footwear suitable for every moment of the day, including most elegant events, the Santini brothers have made their creations not only a synonym for comfort but also for sophistication and exclusivity. Meticulous attention to detail, coupled with sophisticated and elegant design, make Massimo Santini footwear an essential element in the wardrobe of the most elegant women, thus shaping the future of women's fashion with a unique and timeless touch of class.

The world of mat fashion is an exceptional, stylish and charismatic one! Join in! For the last four decades, with emphasis on body positivity and not restricted by sizes and body types, mat fashion has been creating modern outfits flattering women’s curves and making their unique personality traits shine. The company was founded in 1987 by the Monedas family with a vision to create fashion that steals the spotlight in size-inclusive clothing. mat fashion quickly becomes the top Greek clothing company in its category, expanding in more than 50 countries. Today, all mat fashionistas can be unique, feminine and stylish but most of all themselves.The brand’s previous taglines 'Free Yourself' and 'Real Size' is transforming to 'Charismatic · Life’. mat fashion designs complete capsule collections for all women to live a charismatic life.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - Plus size, Retail, Wholesale, and brand

DESCRIPTION: Matinique provides the modern man with the wardrobe to lead a confident and enjoyable life in the city. We create fashionable collections blending formal and casual looks with high quality and affordability. This provides him with a modern style that enables him to express his individuality. With over 40 years of experience, Matinique is the urban mans preferred brand. Our designs are masculine, sharp, modern and functional with great attention to fabrics, a perfect fit and craftsmanship. Matinique was founded in 1973 in Copenhagen, Denmark by Niels Martinsen, whose vision was to create comfortable, high-quality and fashionable clothing for men.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - Menswear, Fashion, Danish Design, and Mens Fashion

DESCRIPTION: Launched in 2016 Mazi Untitled's unique fabric, clean design and practical details define a brand that creates the perfect everyday products. Mazi Untitled aims to become a brand that expresses natural style in everyday life by making things necessary for our daily lives, centering on bags.

MAZINE is more than a brand or clothing – it is an optimistic attitude to life. We come from all corners of the world and our mission is to consciously create urban streetwear for open-minded people who live life to the fullest, so that you not only look good, but feel good too. Designing, distributing and supplying streetwear since 1998. MAZINE isn't just a brand - it's an optimistic way of life. From asphalt into nature our fashion is created for open-minded people with ideals, dreams and a zest for action, who care about the environment.

Every mbyM collection is made with a MESSAGE. mbyM is all about being comfortable in your own body. We want our collections to be as effortless and wearable as possible. mbyM is rooted in bold simplicity- Attention to detail is key. Our collections hold accessible ready-to-wear staples that are deeply inspired by our Scandinavian heritage. At mbyM we are proud of our roots. We interpret the trends the mbyM way while staying true to our DNA.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - Women's apparel and fashion, Retail, Wholesale, and Design

DESCRIPTION: Discover modern jewelry & timeless leather pieces handmade in Italy

MEIMEIJ’s brand essence is encapsulated in a contemporary feminine aesthetic expressed in architectural volumes and sculpted silhouettes, softened by romantic details and refined workmanship. The MEIMEIJ woman is feminine, contemporary and urban in nature. A vision of femininity inspired by a sartorial heritage that has been handed down for generations. Meimeij dresses the woman in her multifaceted and multifaceted intrinsic nature. The heritage of the designer, who grew up watching her mother work with dedication in a tailor’s laboratory, shows itself present and constant in the MeiMeij collection studio. The construction of the garment is at the heart of the creation and development of the product; an attitude and a discipline that is traceable in the couture world. Volumes and silhouettes play a leading role in MeiMeij’s world. The visual memory recalls an urban imagery of elegant architecture, minimal materials and delicate constructions. The inspirational muse shaping the soul of the brand is woman herself. The protagonist is a refined femininity, in its complexity and contradiction. MeiMeij garment is a combination of delicacy and structure, minimal and maximal; which manifests itself in the balance sought in the choice of materials, workmanship, texture and colour.

Melissa, founded in 1979, boasts a revolutionary and groundbreaking design. Drawing inspiration from the sandals worn by fishermen along the picturesque French Riviera, Melissa swiftly captured the hearts of many, establishing itself as a reputable name in the footwear industry.
INDUSTRY: Footwear Manufacturing - Plastic Shoes, Innovation, Eco-Fashion, Sustainable Fashion, and Footwear

DESCRIPTION: MEPHISTO is a Lifestyle shoe brand for men and women. Founded nearly 60 years ago in France, MEPHISTO shoes are still manufactured there. Available around the world in more than 80 countries - 18.000 points of sale and 900 MEPHISTO Concept Stores - MEPHISTO is well known and recognized for the high level of quality and comfort of its shoes. A brand to suit all needs with a large and complete Women and Men collection of Boots, shoes and sandals, from casual style to dress style. Whether for everyday use, outdoor activities or special occasions, MEPHISTO offers shoes that combine style and functionality. The unique Soft-Air technology, integrated in all shoes and sandals, provide an incomparable comfort and feeling when walking. We design and manufacture ourselves our shoes in our own factory. From the leather cutting to the finish, all steps of the shoe-making are handmade to ensure an exceptional quality. We guarantee craftsmanship at a high level, perfect fit and unrivalled comfort.

Mercer Amsterdam is a sustainable footwear and apparel brand founded in 2013 by Pim Dresen. Based in Amsterdam, the brand focuses on footwear and apparel for men and women. Mercer Amsterdam was named after Mercer Street in New York City where Pim bought his first pair at age 10. The accompanying shield-logo represents the map of Amsterdam. The product is produced in BSCI-certified factories with a heavy focus on sustainability. The main idea of the brand is to create distinct silhouettes, fully designed in-house from sole to lace to create a unique look-and-feel with a sustainable touch by using materials that are Global Recycled Standard certified, PETA certified VEGAN, Piñatex and Leather-Working-Group certified.Mercer became well-known in 2017 for its collaborations with NASA, Beverly Hills Hotel, UCLA and Starter. Additionally, Mercer was the first brand to collaborate with Piñatex in order to create the first fully sustainable vegan sneaker made from pineapple leather. Mercer went on to create footwear from Italian grapes, Apples and mesh from plastic recovered from the ocean in collaboration with Seaqual.
INDUSTRY: Retail Luxury Goods and Jewelry-Shoes, Sneakers, Fashion, and Apparel

DESCRIPTION: Merrell was established in 1981 when two executives for the Rossignol ski company, Clark Matis and John Schweizer, decided to launch a new maker of hiking boots. Since 1997, the company has been a wholly-owned subsidiary of shoe industry giant Wolverine World Wide. Today, as the global leader in outdoor active footwear with the Moab hiking boot and Jungle Moc, Merrell is focused on merging performance, styling, and comfort to empower all people to confidently explore the outdoors. We believe in sharing the simple power of being outside. No matter who you are, where you came from, who you love or how you move — Everyone should be welcome in the outdoors and wherever life takes us. We strive to inspire everyone because, together, we can help protect the trail we love.

MIA FRATINO is committed to delivering environmentally responsible, sustainable and ethical knitwear. We don’t just pay lip service to the notion of ethical production, sustainable fibres and slow fashion. We live and breathe these values in every step of our yarn spinning, design and manufacturing process. MIA FRATINO AW24 presents a season of fierce innovation. A revolution in sustainable knitwear. A collection where convention is discarded in favour of the daring, surprising and sophisticated. We’ve experimented with new techniques and bold design to showcase and unlock the very best in knitwear ~ pushing the boundaries of what cashmere is capable of. This collection is as much of a hello to the new MIA FRATINO as it is an homage to our past.

Migliorini is a 360º creative public relations, communications, and sales agency specialized within the responsible and conscious lifestyle segment. Since its establishment in 2015, Migliorini has been instrumental in shaping brand identities and securing acknowledgement both in Scandinavia and internationally. We are excited to showcase a thoughtfully curated portfolio of brands at CIFF during Copenhagen Fashion Week AW24. Featured brands include Fête Impériale, SIGNE, Aur Studio, Stella Forest, Olistic, Sophie + Lucie, OM-SE, La Bouche Rouge and Licia Florio.
INDUSTRY: Public Relations and Communications Services - Branding, Strategic Marketing, Public Relations, and Social Media

DESCRIPTION: MiiR is a premium lifestyle brand with a social and environmental mission. Independently owned and operated, we prioritize supporting people and stewarding the planet.  B Corp. Climate Neutral certified. Certified Evergreen. 1% for the Planet member.In our history, we have given over $4,000,000 and empowered the lives of 115,000+ people worldwide. We encourage our customers to connect to the good we are creating together by registering the Give Code™ found on the base of their MiiR product.
INDUSTRY: Retail - Consumer Goods, Coffee, Drinkware, Customized Drinkware, Beer, Spirits, Wine, Partnerships, Water Bottles, Non-Profit Support, promotional products, design, generosity, water bottle, hydration, specialty, gift, premium, partnership, and tastemaker

DESCRIPTION: With it´s unique windbreaker and leather concept, MILESTONE is one of the few specialists in this field. The product is aimed at the fashion-conscious consumer, who emphasizes delicious qualities and the right details and finishes on things. There is always a focus on innovative fabrics and the development of new washing technology and finishing methods, so that MILESTONE always appears as an innovative jacket and leather specialist. As a true specialist in it´s field, MILESTONE is a very exciting product with Value for Money.

With it´s unique windbreaker and leather concept, MILESTONE is one of the few specialists in this field. The product is aimed at the fashion-conscious consumer, who emphasizes delicious qualities and the right details and finishes on things. There is always a focus on innovative fabrics and the development of new washing technology and finishing methods, so that MILESTONE always appears as an innovative jacket and leather specialist. As a true specialist in it´s field, MILESTONE is a very exciting product with Value for Money.

Minimal - Nordic - Modern - Timeless Minimum originates from a classic scandinavian aesthetic with focus on sophisticated and understated details. We believe in the simplicity of good style. We believe in refining and elevating classics into a contempary context We re-imagine essentials while embracing nordic tradition, quality and craftsmanship

Miss Goodlife is an internationally operating company in the fashion and lifestyle industry. Since 2013, we continue to grow, with our range constantly expanding. Our colorful and fancy designs can be perfectly combined with each other. The prints we use are used multiple times, which means they can be found in skirts and dresses as well as in blouses. We also design current international trends that cover a wide spectrum in the fashion sector: unique cuts in classic to expressive styles with special prints, embroidery and sparkling details. Our goal is to create combinations and worlds that convey a positive lifestyle.

MJM is a Danish wholesaler and retail company founded in 1829. For three centuries, we have made products that promote and reflect the current fashion trends for both men and women. Whether you’re into fashion, fishing or hunting, MJM provides the headwear to match your needs.
Contemporary take on neo-menswear conveyed through a female voice.

As an innovative lifestyle brand, Moaconcept believes in the power of ideas, art, culture, creativity, and positive comparisons. The Moaconcept project was established by a group of Italian designers in 2013 who see art and creativity as their calling, blending original artistic inspiration with an understanding of luxury market trends. Florence-based Moaconcept combines Italian style with international flair. Moaconcept became a Benefit Company in 2022, a corporate structure rooted in the culture of corporate social responsibility that places a high priority on achieving socially and environmentally responsible goals. As a result, Moaconcept has donated part of its profits back to the community through several initiatives.
INDUSTRY: Fashion Accessories Manufacturing - Footwear and Fashion

DESCRIPTION: Modström was founded in 2004 and the colourful and feminine design soon won over lots of hearts paving the way for Modström to develop into a complete brand concept. The company culture is characterised by passion for fashion, entrepreneurship and hard work, which brings a hands-on female perspective to the fashion industry. With focusing on creating a meaningful business model throughout the supply chain all the way to the girl in the street. The overall mission is not to aim Modström designs at an exclusive crowd, but rather to create a beautiful and easy-to-wear wardrobe relevant to a wide selection of women.

MOLIIN is a fashion brand aiming to provide clothing for the strong modern women. We were founded on the objective of creating a brand that provides a feminine and bohemian aesthetic twisted with a raw and cool attitude. Key drivers for MOLIIN is the passion of creating multiple prints which are carefully created from scratch. That is why it is essential for the brand that care and caution is taken for every single part of the garment process.

Fashion with A Feminine Look Molly Jo is perfect for your shop if your customers are socially active and fashion-conscious women, who love to dress for success, in stylish clothes with a feminine look and refined details. Highlighting Feminine Shapes with Colour Molly Jo's styles highlight feminine shapes, in an elegant and chic way, while diverting attention from the less flattering areas. Molly Jo is perfect for women who want to dress in colourful garments with character, that gives the wearer a youthful look. The colours, prints, and patterns naturally reflect the trends of the seasons. Lightness and Elegance Molly Jo's biannual collection offers you light tops and dresses in lovely prints and gorgeous colours, each in a feminine cut. But the brand also provides trousers in different cuts and elegant jumpsuits in various colours that flatter all women. With the right eye for detail and a perfect fit, Molly Jo's classics with a twist can add value to your clothing store, boutique, or online shop.

Founded in 2020, Monel is a Norwegian brand rooted in tradition and driven by a passion for quality craftmanship. As a family-run business, Monel aspires to create timeless and exceptional pieces that capture the essence of Norwegian heritage and modern elegance. Whether you opt for an urban stroll or an adventure in the great outdoors, our collections are meticulously crafted to excel in the untamed wilderness as well as the bustling cityscape.

A healthy scalp not only supports the production of healthy hair but also contributes towards the hair’s natural growth and retention. Traditional brands fail to recognise this interdependent relationship between the hair and scalp. Hence conventional haircare brands focus on treating the hair itself with little attention paid to the crucial role the scalp plays as an incubatory environment for the pre-emergent hair. Crafted by leading scientists, beauty experts and dermatologists, MONPURE believe the scalp should be at the heart of any hair regime, which is why our products were created to treat both scalp and hair. Our products deliver fundamental benefits for better hair growth, as well as improving the quality of the scalp and hair itself, for boosted health, strength and shine.
INDUSTRY: Cosmetics - haircare, scalpcare, hair health, scalp health, clean beauty, clean ingredients, hair loss, hair thinning, sustainability, scalp irritation, shampoo, conditioner, dermatologically tested, serum, mask, scrub, vegan, natural, cruelty free, and sustainable luxury

DESCRIPTION: MOS MOSH is a universe of timeless wardrobe pieces with a twist. We are known for our high quality, high comfort, and extraordinary attention to detail. Even though our styles are of high quality, it's important for us to make them affordable. This makes us ensure our unique DNA. To make sure every garment is perfect, we always twist and turn it as it is essential for us to be known for our passion and not for compromising. Our well-fitted and appealing styles stand out, and so do we. We want to dress women worldwide with flattering styles that empower everyone wearing them.

Moschino is a storied Italian fashion house known for its imaginative and ironic approach to design. Founded in Milan in 1983 by Franco Moschino, it is recognized worldwide for its unique blend of high fashion and humor. 2023 marks the brand’s 40th anniversary and the start of Davide Renne’s tenure as creative director Davide Renne, to helm the artistic vision of the House. Moschino is part of the Aeffe Group, whose brand portfolio also includes Alberta Ferretti, Philosophy di Lorenzo Serafini and Pollini. The brand offers women’s, men’s and kidswear ready-to-wear, accessories, eyewear and fragrances.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - Haute Couture, Prèt-a-porter, Shoes, Retail, Accessories, and Appareal

DESCRIPTION: Moves, established in 2015 as part of Minimum A/S, is a Danish fashion brand with an international mindset, dedicated to empowering women. Our collections offer a full range of versatile pieces, complemented by a dedicated capsule of dresses carefully crafted for every occasion. Inspired by the ever-evolving fashion landscape, our designs seamlessly blend effortless style with contemporary trends. Join us in celebrating feminine style and inspiring confidence in every woman.

Movesgood is designed for you and our earth collectively, with a belief in all kinds of good movements at its heart. Our mission is to be your first choice for sustainable basics, providing our customers with timeless, high quality and longer lifecycle clothes and accessories. We are fuelled by our purpose and motivation to bring change and awareness to the social and environmental issues within the fashion industry. We consciously create pieces that are soft and beautiful with sustainable and ethical practices at the core. We consider ourselves to be part of the movement working to improve the fashion industry, and pride ourselves in only using environmentally-friendly materials and practices; tightly managing our supply chain through our Lean Production model; using partner factories with fair working conditions; and continuously looking for ways to decrease our impact on the planet without compromising on design and quality.

Products that last for generations Martin Pedersen established the company with his first factory In Denmark back in 1937. Our products have been World Class ever since - this is simply our DNA. We have maintained our head office in Herning, Denmark, where all design, product development, administration, and sales remain. The main factory is today located in Latvia close to the capital Riga, where we produce in the range of 4 mio. pairs of socks annually.

Welcome to Mr-Fashion, your number one source for all things Fashion. We’re dedicated to giving you the very best of apparel, with a focus on three characteristics, dependability, customer service and uniqueness.Founded in 2001 by Richard Price, Mr-Fashion, has come a long way from its beginnings in a Los Angeles Fashion Studio. When Richard first started out, his passion for Apparel started in sales selling to Better Fashion Boutiques all around the U.S. It gave Richard the impetus to turn hard work and inspiration into to a booming online store. We now serve customers all over the US and the world and are thrilled to be a part of the Designer wing of the Fashion industry. Teaching at FIDM gave him an insight on young inquisitive minds. We hope you enjoy our products as much as we enjoy offering them to you. If you have any questions or comments, please don’t hesitate to contact us.

We have embraced the Scandinavian minimalism style as the foundation of our visual universe and overall brand approach. This design style is categorized by simplicity, functionality, and a focus on clean, organized lines, which perfectly aligns with our brand vision. At MSCH, we take pride in our brand name, which stands for Minimalist - Scandi - Creations and Heritage. These core elements drive our brand values and guide us in every decision we make.

WE BELIEVE THAT GOOD QUALITY NEVER GOES OUT OF FASHION Every time we design a piece of garment, we strive to create your new favorite classic which you will use for years to come and which makes you happy every time you wear it. We have a strong focus on good craftsmanship and high comfort and we carefully handpick our yarns and fabrics in relation to both quality and sustainability. The style is oversized and relaxed, and we swarm to the timeless Scandinavian design tradition in beautiful dusty and matching colors. We work exclusively with European manufactures - just as the majority of our yarns and fabrics are produced in Europe too. Muse is a small Danish design company founded in 2013. We are anchored in Thy with the great North Sea and Thy National Park as our nearest neighbors, and it is with this beauty wild in mind we design new muses.

A nostalgic strawberry tableware collection spun by MUVEIL, which values warmth, and Noritake, which has a long history.Tableware from a new collaboration between “MUVEIL” and the long-established Japanese tableware brand “Noritake” will be released on Friday, March 17, 202
My Soul was created in 2006, when the designer Irene Hviid Omme wanted to create her own brand for the women that wants to challenge the typical and ordinary style. Without comprimising on quality
sneakers for women, men and children

Nadia Wire is a newly established knitwear brand, that launched in 2020. ‘We knit bold colours and playful shapes to fit all seasons and wardrobes. All our pieces are manufactured at our knitting factory in Denmark, where we operate under a small scale and a made to order vision. Working side by side with our production department, we take well-informed design decisions, and, by extension, saves avoidable waste.’
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - knitwear, fashion, and digital knitting

DESCRIPTION: Nailberry is a high-end and award-winning brand of toxin-free nail lacquers and nail care products, which are made in France and developed using a patented oxygenation technology. The brand is recognised for its healthy and breathable polishes whose film is permeable to air and water, without making any compromise on color vivacity, shine and longevity. The spirit of Nailberry has a sensitivity to health & wellness, and a respect to the environment & nature. These values are at the core of all of the brand’s activities. The product formulas are certified 12-free, vegan, halal, cruelty free and gluten free. Our story so far - Nailberry was founded in 2012 by Sonia Hully. The brand started as a luxury Nail Bar in Chelsea London, and swiftly transitioned into a range of multi-award winning premium polishes. When Sonia noted her high profile clientele were continuing to experience dry and damaged nails - whether it was the result of lifestyle, pollution, or from the semi-permanent gel manicures - she developed a range of polishes that would help combat their concerns. The result was the award winning L’Oxygéné range. Using the latest in patented technology, L’Oxygéné delivers colour in a healthier manicure. It has since been complemented with an extensive range of Nail Treatments, exclusively designed to further treat and repair damaged nails.
INDUSTRY: Retail Health and Personal Care Products - Nail Polishes and Nail Care Treatments

DESCRIPTION: Narcyss offers high-performance skincare and wellness essentials for modern, urban life. Each complex formula powers the skin’s essential functions to transform its health and vitality, focusing on repairing the skin and protecting against stress, pollution and outside aggressors. Our skincare routine delivers on performance and simplicity which is the secret to a good complexion if used consistently. At Narcyss we know you live fast and is constantly on the go, just like us. We believe in modern wellness where you enjoy a negroni at dinner and do yoga in the morning, and where ageing is done in a healthy way, not in an “anti” way. Modern wellness and healthy ageing are cornerstones of Narcyss
INDUSTRY: Manufacturing - skincare, beauty, wellness, lifestyle, and fashion

DESCRIPTION: Nature Footwear is your destination for footwear that uniquely combines fashion and sustainability. We are proud to offer an exclusive collection of shoes created with care and love for our planet. We are a small company that is proud of our products and the many steps we take to make shoes for you. As a completely transparent company, we ensure that our partners are certified as ethical – both from a human and environmental point of view. We put people above profit. Quality over quantity.
Created to represent top fashion brands from Ukraine and support them. We support Ukrainian designers by distributing and selling their products in the UK and supporting them from afar.

At Neo Noir, our strongest asset is our dedication to the products we make. Thanks to our day-to-day communication with clients and retailers, we always offer the highest level of help and service. As we are constantly in touch with our retailers, we are always updated on trends in-season, as well as long term. Our office in China gives us the ability to move fast and work well with express deliveries, and our skilled staff ensures a sharp eye for quality.

The company was set up in 1975 and in 1989 concentrating all its resources on the development of the “NeroGiardini” brand. NeroGiardini uses Italian raw materials, to guarantees highest quality for every shoe. Two logistics hubs was been designed to guarantee rapid delivery in Italy and abroad. Made in Italy is at the centre of all NeroGiardini’s strategic decisions.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - Shoes, Bags, Apparel, Retail, Footwear, Bags, Clothing, shoes, and made in Italy

DESCRIPTION: NetWork, which joined the Turkish ready-made clothing industry in 1999 and is under the umbrella of Beymen Group, is a creative and dynamic brand that feeds on the multicultural structure of the 21st century and enriches itself with new expansions.  NetWork, which always maintains its clear line, primarily reflects the information and technology age we are in with the name it has chosen as a brand.It symbolizes.  On the other hand, it also defines the process of bringing a ready-to-wear collection to life, from idea to design, from sewing to presentation.  Since the first day of its establishment, NetWork has been reflecting the dynamism of the daily life of modern and urban people into fashion with a realistic approach.  NetWork collections have a refined line that urban women and men can carry from day to night, adapting to the intense pace of life, becoming original in details, and standing out with their fabric quality.  Producing different alternatives for every moment of life, NetWork became the first Turkish ready-made clothing brand to offer limited production privileges with the Limited brand launched in August 2004.

DESCRIPTION: NEUW IS A MODERN DENIM BRAND, MADE FOR METROPOLITAN PEOPLE. BORN FROM LOVE FOR; JEANS, MUSIC AND CONTEMPORARY CULTURE. THE GENERIC CONNOTATION OF A DENIM BRAND IS CASUAL DAY TIME WEAR. HOWEVER, THIS IS NOT NEUW. SINCE THE BRAND INCEPTION, NEUW HAS BEEN DEFINED BY DARK JEANS WITH A SHARP EDGE INSPIRED BY MUSIC. WE ARE NIGHT TIME DENIM BRAND.

New Feet offers footwear for sensitive feet - built on orthopaedic craftsmanship for the conscious user, who puts health first. Today New Feet is dedicated to produce footwear that can  be used in treatment, after-treatment and prevention of foot related problems.New Feet has grown from being a local Danish shoe company to be a growing international brand. We hold on to the basis of our success - by producing footwear with a consumer demand, offered to them by a range af serious and well educated resellers, that are supported by a network in the health sector.

Although born in Sweden, Nicklas aka NIK was bred on the beaches across the southern parts of Europe. Swimwear became his natural choice of apparel in his everyday life, not only for lazy days bumming on the beach, but also at the gym, relaxing at home or even on the golf course.Benjamin aka BEN was born on the Swedish west coast, typically spending his summers hopping from island to island on sailboats in their renowned archipelago. He would later be found at Central Saint Martins in London – surrounded with endless amounts of inspiration and creativity, he developed a vision to establish a product that would bring fashion to new dimensions.NIK and BEN crossed paths in Spain, bonded instantly, a few years onwards they decided to take destiny in their own hands – the rest is history.

Nikolaj storm copenhagen is a young streetwear brand, founded by nikolaj storm and based in the beautiful capital of denmark – copenhagen. with a long background in the danish fashion industry working with various brands and a master degree from the royal danish academy of fine arts – nikolaj storm represents an eclectic style of menswear turned into a genderless universe with focus on storytelling, prints and handpicked materials. nikolaj storm is colorful, bold clothing made for people who dare to be free. people who dare to use colors. people who dare to be themselves. nikolaj storm does not work with a classic seasonal structure, but instead the collections are driven by creativity and weather. our mission is to bring colorful and showstopping clothes to everyone – we love to see all types of people styling and using the clothes in new innovative settings, or combined in different   ways depending on your individual style.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion  - Design, Streetwear, Sustainable Design, Printdesign, Fashion, and Genderless

DESCRIPTION: NO. 1 BY OX is a Danish brand established in 2017 by founder Anette Oxenbøll for the plus-size fashionable woman. Combining style and functionality's with a touch of Scandinavian design aesthetic, the brand’s vision is to create unique garments celebrating the curvy body. Designed with body inclusivity in mind, the brand’s signature styles will make you feel and look your best. The brand’s mission is to make a difference in the plus-size clothing industry and deliver premium styles especially made for the curvy woman. The brand is focused on delivering iconic designs that will make plus-size women feel more confident, comfortable and stylish. With 6 annuals collections, NO. 1 BY OX aims to offer wardrobe staples ideal for every season and occasion. From chic daywear to elegant occasion wear, the designs are made with high-attention to details and from the best materials such as soft viscose, recycled polyester, premium leather and other functional fabrics. NO. 1 BY OX is represented by retailers all over Europe and can be found in numerous physical and online stores. “Our styles beautifully accentuate your body’s natural grace” NO. 1 BY OX

Established in 2015, Noa Harmon stands as a distinguished Valencian footwear brand that transcends conventional boundaries. Our founding ethos revolves around the commitment to deliver an unparalleled experience, extending beyond mere footwear. Noa Harmon is synonymous with a transformative journey, designed to evoke a profound sense of individuality, seamlessly blending the elements of cutting-edge design, uncompromising comfort, and exceptional quality. At the heart of our brand is a relentless pursuit of uniqueness, exemplified by our unwavering dedication to harmonizing style and substance. With an unwavering commitment to innovation, we have carved a niche for ourselves, redefining the very essence of footwear. Each creation is meticulously crafted to not only adorn your feet but to become an extension of your identity, allowing you to authentically express yourself. Noa Harmon is more than a brand; it is a testament to the fusion of artistry and functionality. Our curated collections epitomize a seamless blend of contemporary design aesthetics and ergonomic precision, ensuring that every step you take is a stride toward self-expression and sophistication. Elevate your style with Noa Harmon – where design, comfort, and quality converge to redefine the boundaries of footwear excellence.

At Nobody’s Child we do things differently, leading where we can. Our conscience drives our desire to be better and we’re honest about our green credentials. We produce clothes that you’ll want to wear again and again - the aim of the game is to avoid landfill, not add to it. London is our home, where in-house designers create unique and individual prints and shapes synonymous with Nobody’s Child. We don’t believe in standard seasonal collections, so instead we drop new lines regularly. By producing small collections (warning: our stuff doesn’t hang around for long)and refreshing our signature shapes in new fabrics and prints, we’re committed to making only what we really believe in.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - Fashion, Clothing, Sustainability, E-tailer, and Women's Fashion

DESCRIPTION: The underlying philosophy in Noella is to create feminine fashion designs, that are consistently relevant for you, who love fashion. We embrace the daring girl with our voguish take on the latest trends and timeless pieces.With a fast-forward approach to the latest trends, our team of dynamic designers work with the greatest commitment to ensure that our contemporary design is always available to anyone - they take immediate action, when they spot a seasonal must-have.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - Fashion, Wholesale, Retail, Brand, and Design

DESCRIPTION: One giant leap for trail kind.  The world's only trail running shoes made with bio-based Dyneema®, the world's strongest and lightest fibre.  Inspired by Canada's Toughest Conditions

NORGÄTE, a Peruvian responsible luxury brand, harmoniously blends high-quality craftsmanship, fair trade practices, and sustainability in Alpaca and Pima cotton garments. Each piece embodies our commitment to authenticity, meticulously crafted in Peru with a zero-waste approach guided by 'Reduce, Reuse, Recycle.' Our timeless collection showcases versatile products that beckon to be a part of your everyday life. The fabrics we use are not just fashion-forward but also gentle on your skin, merging sustainability with style. Proudly presenting a collection honoring Peruvian craftsmanship, preserving our planet, and embracing gender fluid designs. With NORGÄTE, you don't compromise; you embrace fashion and eco-conscious living. Join our journey of conscious elegance, headquartered in Peru and based in Zagreb, Croatia, strategically managing our supply chain for all EU countries.

Founded in Denmark in 1999 by Jan Andersen and Poul Madsen, Normann Copenhagen is an international design brand rooted in Danish design traditions. Our continuously expanding collection encompassing furniture, lighting and home accessories is defined by clean lines with a playful twist and crafted with an emphasis on quality and durability.Since Normann Copenhagen’s foundation in 1999, our ambition has been to challenge conventional thinking and make the ordinary extraordinary through great design. By combining the craftsmanship, functionality and endurance characterized by our Danish design heritage with modern silhouettes and durable materials, we aim to create original products in a contemporary design that withstand the test of time. We believe in uniting people and spaces across the world and improving the quality of people’s lives through the power of great design. Our products combine functionality and design and accommodate the diversity of needs of modern life in residential and professional interiors alike. We aspire to increasingly contribute to the making of meaningful spaces that connect people by becoming one of the global leaders in design.
INDUSTRY: Design Services - Design, Furniture, Lighting, Home Accessories, Interior Design, and Architecture

DESCRIPTION: With a clean feminine approach to design NORR masters the art of creating strong contemporary ready-to-wear collections with attention to details.Our mission is to create dynamic, concept-driven collections where every piece is a combination of quality material and unique design.

Founded by the American sailor Lowell North in 1957, North Sails has become one of the world's leading sails makers. Today, the same grit and innovative spirit are embodied in the clothing and accessories collection for men, women, and children. Suitable for both the sea and the city life. North Sails' mission is Go Beyond, to push the limits of performance, continue to set new, higher goals, and surpass the competition. As an ocean brand, North Sails Apparel wants to be part of the change when it comes to marine protection. Exploration, innovation, and conservation are the brand’s core values which drive also the aesthetic and ethical vision, as well as fuel its commitment to preserving the environment.

Nostrasantissima is a passion that turns into a project, that becomes a Brand.The Made In Italy Brand was launched in 2012 by Cristian e Biba, who daily share their lives and projects. In 2014 the first Men’s and Women’s Collection was presented to buyers.In 2015 Manuela and Alessio supported the project and enclosed it in Mary Fashion, Italian Company leader in production for international Top Luxury Brands, celebrities and fashion show garments. At present, Nostrasantissima boasts of being the only internal Brand.Nostrasantissima is the perfect melting of elegance, romance, irreverence and rebellion, with a touch of kindness that draws inspiration through the history of style and fashion, from Renaissance to Contemporary shapes. It is focused on finding a balance between asymmetric lines and layers made of fabrics and textures

Notes du Nord has created its own take on femininity, shaping a clear modern identity with a strong Nordic vibe for women around the globe. Like a delicate croissant consists of several layers besides what is visible to the naked eye, we know that all women are wonderful whole individuals composed of a variety of distinct roles we play in our lives. Notes du Nord is a brand that aims to strengthen and empower women. We design for women who don’t want to compromise and don’t want to be limited. We shift seamlessly from carefree socialite to serious career woman – from loving mom to sensual lover. Each layer carefully manicured through life’s experiences, creating a beautiful, complex creature that is the modern woman. Notes du Nord creates pieces with impact, whether you’re at home, at work or glamming up for a night out. An attention to detail and exceptional materials, paired with balanced feminine and masculine design codes, defines every Notes du Nord collection.

NÜ is a Danish fashion brand for women with a unique style. Raw, sophisticated and feminine are the essence of NÜ. At NÜ, we create fashion that allows the modern woman to express her own unique femininity. Raw, sophisticated and feminine. It’s as simple as that.

This is Nudie Jeans Co. We're not just in the business of selling jeans. We're in the business of making them a part of your life, for the long haul. Our wear-and-tear philosophy is all about making sure your jeans live as long as you do, maybe even longer! It's like having a second skin that just gets better with age. We started this journey in the small city of Gothenburg back in 2001. Our Swedish roots remind us every day to be good to the Earth and to each other. It's not just about organic cotton and transparent processes; it's about building a community that cares. So here's the deal: every pair of jeans we make is designed to be your 'forever jeans.' They're the kind you'll want to repair, not replace. The kind you'll hand down to your kids, who'll hand them down to theirs. We're not just making clothes; we're creating future classics. Clothes that become vintage, instead of garbage.Founded in Gothenburg in 2001, the Swedish denim company has been recognized for their work with sustainability, both environmental and social. With a denim selection made from 100% organic cotton and transparent production, Nudie Jeans Co is in the fore edge and has taken a prominent role in the industry’s work for a more sustainable existence.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - jeans, denim, selvage denim, dry denim, Black Denim, Sustainability, and Re-use

DESCRIPTION: We are NÜMPH; driven by the will and desire to create a whimsical and colorful brand, which add that extra dimension to your wardrobe. Those items that embrace your personality and put you in the spotlight when you make an entrance. By playing with shapes, details and hand-drawn prints, we create the NÜMPH collections. We design clothes for the optimistic, strong and independent woman, who draws attention by means of her own personal style. We are NÜMPH.
Nuni Copenhagen is a Danish jewelry brand. The duo behind the brand Maria Fodeh and Kenny Christensen have more than 30 years of joint experience from the jewelry and accessories industry.

From 2009 until today, Nuno works 100% to create contact between manufacturers and retailers within organic clothing, toys in natural and wearable materials and shoes in pure raw materials. We have contact with stores throughout Scandinavia. Nuno also sells an exclusive selection of goods from its own warehouse, consisting of creative things such as Stockmar colours, finger paints, modeling wax etc. At Nuno, in addition to Anni, you will also find Ida Hauge and Kasper Bay-Smidt.

The Danish skincare brand NUORI is the first natural beauty brand that truly performs. We develop all-natural skincare that is at the forefront of bio-active ingredient innovation and delivers visible results. NUORI’s vision has always been to eliminate the need to choose between all-natural formulas and results. NUORI products contain only natural ingredients with clinically proven benefits and absolutely no synthetic or toxic additives. We are the only beauty brand to utilize the science of freshly blended formulas. That’s why the world’s top international spas and skincare therapists prefer NUORI.

NYNNE is a Danish contemporary luxury label that functions as a bridge between the Contemporary and Designer universe. The brand philosophy lies in the exploration of dressing as a form of power with glamorous yet pragmatic clothing meant to amplify confidence. The designs can be labeled as new classics with a bold and contemporary twist for the modern woman. We believe that every day practicality should not rule out glamour. The label is grounded in the democratic Scandinavian values of timeless design, sustainable production, and long-lasting quality mixed with bold and exaggerated silhouettes.. NYNNE is valuing strong craftsmanship and everything is made in Europe.

O My Bag is an Amsterdam-based bag and accessories brand that produces high-end products made to last. We are all about making a positive difference in the world, by connecting producers in small communities to the global market. We use business as a force for good. O My Bag is known for its timeless, sophisticated, and bold design. Our vegetable-tanned leather last a lifetime and only gets prettier over time. Our new collection always contains styles that go well with our current collection. This season our campaign is 'Wear What you Know'. With a focus on shape and texture, we bring you a diverse array of designs that instantly transport you into the lively heart of bustling market stalls. Join us this season in discovering our collection, celebrating craftsmanship and transparency and the choices we make through the bags we wear. Our product range goes from wallets to bags to lifestyle products in both eco-leather and vegan apple leather. We are currently sold in over 25 countries and got B-Corp certified in 2021.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - Fairly Made, Ecological Leather, Fashion, Sustainable, Sustainable Fashion, Bags, and Handbags

DESCRIPTION: Odd Molly’s award-winning design in everything from clothing to interiors encourages women of all ages to feel and be their best selves. The clothes are celebrated for high quality, colour, pattern, natural materials and lots of details made by hand. Today Odd Molly is sold all around the world but the story all began as a tribute to one girl, a skater girl called Molly in Venice Beach back in the 80s. Breaking with convention and following her heart, she became Odd Molly’s constant muse, whose love for life lives on in every step the brand takes.Odd Molly will always be inspired by, and fight for more Mollys in the world.

Established in 2018, Odd Pearls is a jewelry brand created by designer Noam Elazar.Odd Pearls is a women-owned and led business, which embraces oddity in various ways and holds a strong genderless approach to design, unburdened by boundaries.The central vision behind the brand is creating a legacy that will continue the craft of pearl jewelry, globally known and loved, by making it approachable to a new generation of customers of all ages and genders. The design is inspired by the natural state of the pearl and its environment, as well as worldwide travels. Just like the brand’s name, the pearls represent the uniqueness within each individual human that cannot be duplicated.Each piece of jewelry is handmade and crafted by goldsmithing and wax carving techniques- allowing a variety of options from customization per order and ready-to-order stock.

Founded in Hamburg, Germany in 1959 and established in 1995, Olsen is an international fashion and lifestyle brand that inspires women in over 20 countries worldwide. Today, in addition to our online store at olsen.ca, over 70 retail stores—both independent and within Hudson’s Bay—span across Canada. We love and live fashion and keep our thumb on the pulse of current trends, which we transform into effortlessly casual looks with feel-good character. With great passion and attention to detail, Olsen creates 18 collections per year and is regarded for its reliable, high-quality European-designed fashion by upscale retailers around the globe. At Olsen, we believe the best time of your life is now. We celebrate strong women who are open to the challenges and chances of life. We see fashion as an opportunity to have fun while simplifying your life through unique wardrobe options that are effortless, functional, and fit your active lifestyle. At the core of our brand, we value friendship and reliability—both of which you are sure to experience as a valued member of our team or as a client being greeted by one of our wardrobe experts. Compassion and responsibility in the supply chain is a top priority, with our mission being to mindfully save resources and reduce plastic waste while creating on-trend styles.
INDUSTRY: Retail - Women's fashions, Women's apparel, Retail career opportunities, Retail management opportunities, and Merchandising

DESCRIPTION: After a lifetime in the industry we knew relationships matter the most. We—Anne and Espen—started Untold Stories together as a couple. We soon grew into the company we’d hoped to be: a warm, deeply caring fashion house that at its core felt like family. Our network of suppliers and retailers is an extension of that family: our story is very much one of togetherness. The label has now evolved into Once Untold. We follow our creative impulses, obsession with craft, and desire to empower effortless expression wherever it leads. Our curiosities and quirks take us to a place of confidence, where we can celebrate our originalities. Once signifies where we’re from: rooted in the city of Oslo. Untold speaks to where we’re going, a future yet to be written. Each piece in our collection reflects this potential: we design them here, but they find full expression wherever your life takes them.

Designed in Copenhagen — made ethically for all on Earth. At Organic Basics, we believe in comfort and sustainability for all. We make our basics to be both Earth- and people-friendly — carefully choosing materials and fabrics that care for our environment, only partnering with factories that consider their impact too, and designing all the basics for all bodies.
INDUSTRY: Technology, Information and Internet - Sustainability, Sustainable fashion, Ethical fashion, Scandinavian design, and E-commerce

DESCRIPTION: Welcome to the Oscalito family, At the core of Oscalito lies a profound connection to the timeless craftsmanship of Italian tradition, a heritage passed down through the generations with passion and dedication. Each piece of our knitwear not only embodies the quality of Made in Italy but also signifies our commitment to responsible production, which takes place in our factory in Turin, from the yarn to the final masterpiece. In our pursuit of excellence, we create products with high-quality and sustainable materials, crafted from natural fibers. This commitment ensures that every garment not only radiates beauty and comfort but also is kind to the environment. Oscalito’s vision is to create a product and an industrial model that is Beautiful, Good, Healthy, Clean, Fair, and Durable. Good when it emerges from an ethical industrial model, rooted in the terrain, fostering values across the entire network of suppliers and partners. Healthy when it becomes a source of well-being for both the wearer, and those who bring it to life, free from harmful substances that may compromise health and the environment. Clean because we are strongly committed to minimizing the environmental impact of the production chain.

We are a Dutch wholesale company that specialises in scarves, garments and accessories. We sell scarves in a variety of qualities, colours and styles. You will find our showroom at The Trademart in De Jaarbeurs in Utrecht and we are also present at multiple fairs around Europe. We would love to see you there so we can show you our beautiful items! Are you already part of our customer system, then please take a look at our newest collection and let us know if we can help you with anything. If not just send us an email and we will make everything ready so that you will be able to sell our collections to your own customers. Our items are a great addition to every shop. Also make sure to get keep in touch with us via our social media such as Facebook and Instagram. And we would love to keep you updated via our newsletter. Just scroll down and fill in your email address to be added to our mailinglist.

OUR SHIFT is a responsible, community-driven fashion brand based in Copenhagen. As a brand that challenges fashion norms, OUR SHIFT offers a positive glimpse into a future where style no longer comes at the expense of our planet. OUR SHIFT’s identity is using upcycling techniques to create garments that convey a powerful message: to halt overproduction. The unique choice of materials, such as abandoned festival tents and deadstock fabrics, shows the commitment to circularity and tells a hopeful story of textiles being rescued from impending landfills. Storytelling lies at the core of OUR SHIFT. Each unique garment narrates a tale of transformation, echoing the ethos of circularity. It’s not only about clothing; it’s about crafting narratives that inspire change. As a community-driven brand, OUR SHIFT inspires and assists its members and industry partners in creating a global movement where responsible fashion becomes a shared value. When someone chooses OUR SHIFT clothes, they don’t just choose fashion; they represent a style that refuses to compromise the health of our planet. Join the movement!

To Our Units, sustainability in the outer world begins in the inner: Being the trouser specialists behind the brands, Five Units and Plain Units, they create trousers with love to make a positive impact on people and planet. Their purpose is to encourage everyone they touch to embrace themselves and take brave steps towards a better balance in life and the world. With the ambition to create trousers for human beings and take co-responsibility for the trousers’ entire life, Five and Plain Units focus on durable materials, design for longevity, and user engagement in product improvements and assortment. The trouser specialists want to secure a match when purchasing to motivate prolonged usage and maintenance. Also, their online community inspires users to care for their trousers, giving them the possibility to order free repair kits, send in trousers for repair and send back worn-out trousers. Furthermore, Five and Plain Units have replaced the individual plastic garment bags with paper wrapping. Five and Plain Units’ holistic step-by-step approach to circularity also includes a closer relationship with retailers, suppliers, and opinion makers to engage the entire ecosystem to move towards a more responsible clothing industry.

Immersed in and formed by city culture, OVER OVER produces finely tuned sportswear that fuses function with a creative and contemporary aesthetic. Meshing music and movement, OVER OVER finds meaning in routine and repetition, freeing your focus and finding your flow. Progressive sports apparel for lightness of being.

The story of O'TAY starts in a small Danish town back in 2019, where Stephanie and her mother, Vivian, agree to realize their shared dream of creating a fashion universe with a focus on luxurious fashion for women of all ages. Mother and daughter's shared passion for fashion started the adventure known today as O'TAY - a recognized and well-established brand offering 'Affordable Luxury' to the quality-conscious woman. The bond between mother and daughter has only grown stronger, since the adventure began in 2019, and this is despite the fact that Stephanie has moved to the East, where she can be very close to the production and make sure that the working conditions are good – that is, far away from the home base and mother Vivian. If you ask mother and daughter, however, the move to the East was a necessity. Quality, transparency and humanity are the key words behind the business and their common heart child, O'TAY, and sometimes important things require big sacrifices and decisions, but this is something that mother and daughter have always agreed with.

The entire P.F. collection is vegan, cruelty-free, and phthalate-free — always. All of our candles are made with 100% domestically-grown soy wax. While our production methods have improved over the years, something that hasn't changed about P.F. products is the people behind them. All of our products are developed, produced, tested, and packed by our team out of our warehouse in Los Angeles, CA.
