INDUSTRY: Manufacturing - Soy Candles, Reed Diffusers, Incense, and Room Spray

DESCRIPTION: Palmes seeks to become a modern-day tennis brand for wearing both on and off the court. The brand takes its name from jeu de paume, the French precursor to tennis that dates back to the 18th century where players used the palms of their hands, and not racquets, for hitting the ball. Palmes is not about how good or bad that you are at playing tennis, how hard you can slice the ball down the singles’ line or how many years that you’ve played; it’s about having fun on and off the court. For too long, tennis has been perceived as a sport for the upper-class elite. Palmes wants to bring aesthetic sensibilities from other creative disciplines into the sphere of tennis to open up the sport from people from a multitude of backgrounds. In short, Palmes seeks to make tennis for the many; not the few.

Pampa is a peruvian label with minimalist and contemporary spirit that offers a thoughtfully curated collection of high quality everyday essentials made from the finest natural materials and innovative fabrics. Our mother company has combined knitting traditions with modern technology to ensure the finest quality. In keeping with the legacy of our Andean heritage. We are not perfect, but we are always looking for ways to do better, as we continue to make the timeless and beloved clothes and accessories that will make us unforgettable. As Pampa, we aim to present fashion under a new light. An approach that respects craftsmanship combined with the nobility of raw materials and design through eco-friendly production processes that embrace the traditional, the innovative and the unexpected. In Pampa, we are constantly pursuing an ethical and transparent trade with our clients that allows us to transcend and be sustainable for our stakeholders such as our collaborators as well as our artisans.

Born out of Copenhagen in 2020, Parel Studios began with the simple mission of amplifying the essence of functional design in products - striking the balance between functionality and aesthetics in the space of traditional workwear, lifestyle and activewear.The name Parel comes from the word apparel, and signifies the brands ethos of clothing that works for all ranges of activity. Parel aims to easily offer comfort and confidence in people's daily routines by creating practical, functional apparel with an all-day usability.

Imagine wandering through the calli of Venice and discovering behind a small door a dusty old workshop where splendid tapestries were woven in the 18th century. Hear the rhythmic sound of treadle looms working incessantly and hypnotizing: well, this is how the looms that Parise uses to weave leather were discovered. Now Parise is a worldwide distributed leather goods company based in Italy, few kilometers far from that Venice, with more than 10 years of experience. Parise bags are unique in the world: only the ladies who work with Parise are in fact able to weave thin cowhide webbing with those 18th century wooden looms, and obtain such a soft and light result. Parise's creations are entirely Made In Italy, handcrafted by the most talented master artisans in the Veneto region. Parise models are contemporary yet timeless, to be handed down from mother to daughter and never go out of fashion. Parise designs are committed to comfortable, all-day wearable styles, paying special attention to details and light gold hardware, made exclusively for Parise.

Part Two is a Danish fashion brand that was established in 1986 with a Scandinavian design history and a design philosophy to create contemporary and timeless collections. Part Two believe in authenticity and honesty and wants to design clothes that remain favorites over time. Part Two knows the importance of a great fit and work hard to find the right qualities when creating modern designs for quality conscious women based on the slogan 'Part Two - made for real women, living real lives'.

Pasotti, was born in Buenos Aires in 1998 by the expert hands of Carmelo, Andreaand a group of Italian shoemakers and master craftsmen. Over time, the skill and passion for craftsmanship have remained intact. Both were passed down from father to son: Franco, Victoria and Antonella. Production is carried out entirely in Argentina; in our atelier in CABA, Buenos Aires. The quality, meticulous attention and details of current fashion, together with the new technologies applied to the finishing, make each Pasotti product a unique and unrepeatable piece. The shapes adapt to contemporary functions in a sober and discreet environment. They create an independent style only for people who love to appropriate the codes of previous generations wrapped in a subtle retro style.

PAST KNOWLEDGE - MADE CURRENT The PAST TENSE brand philosophy is centred around self-expression and the appreciation of high quality. — The constant process of improvement and the desire to always do better products are the brand's drivers. Catering to like-minded people who recognise and appreciate great craftsmanship, PAST TENSE comes out of the idea of not just chasing newness, but slowing down. To contemplate and look at fashion in a past tense. To learn from the past knowledge, traditions and craftsmanship of luxury manufacturing. And take that knowledge and see it through a contemporary lens to create a product with a modern and unique language that is relevant for today and tomorrow. — Expressive yet timeless high-quality products - A new Scandinavian staple

Pavement has made its mark as a strong Danish brand, carved in quality and perfected design. An indisputable craving for solid workmanship and unique details characterise each single collection from Pavement as 1st generation shoemakers. Inspired by urban layers, Pavement is a stylish Fashion Forward brand, currently represented in more than 400 stores across Northern Europe and Scandinavia. The shoes with a Nordic twist are manufactured by means of strong ties between the Danish brand and carefully selected manufacturers in Portugal and Spain. Generations of experience and the sense of quality serve as the basis for Pavement’s success. All styles are handmade with a distinct respect for the material and a sublime fit in mind, resulting in the feeling you are left with, once you take your first step on the Pavement.

Fueled by a passion for great workmanship and true creativity, Philosophy Blues Original was established in 1994 as a Aarhus based fashion brand. Our aesthetic is feminine and elegant, but always with a stylish cool modern take. We always pour our heart into each design by carefully selecting fabrics and developing original prints for each season. This combined with a focus on great fitting and attention to detail, makes us proud to say that we make great wearable fashion for the modern woman. We believe that clothes reflect on who we are, and should be used as a way of strengthening individuality. We always embrace this in the collections - creat- ing timeless fashion that is never boring, trusting our own dreams and creativi- ty above fast trends. This is our philosophy, and we hope that you want to be a part of it.

Setting the standard for classic American style, Pendleton is recognized worldwide as a symbol of American heritage, authenticity and craftsmanship. There have been six generations of family ownership since 1863 when a young English weaver came to Oregon. The company owns and operates some of America’s oldest woolen mills, constantly updating them with state-of-the-art looms and eco-friendly technology.   Inspired by its heritage, Pendleton designs and produces apparel for men and women, blankets, home décor and gifts.  Products are offered in catalogs, online and in Pendleton retail and outlet stores nationally.  Pendleton designs are also sold by select retailers throughout the USA, Canada, Europe and Asia.

PENNYBLACK is a fashion brand founded in 1978, part of the Max Mara Fashion Group. The collections satisfy the needs of today's outgoing and self confident woman, who is seeking a sophisticated but easy-to-wear style, and is looking for high quality fabrics and accurate finishing.

A sincere passion for creating small pieces of everyday beauty with a simplistic and distinct touch is the essential behind the jewellery design from Pernille Corydon. Always with consideration for the world around us, both people and nature. The jewellery is characterized by the obvious connection to the Scandinavian simplicity. Pernille Corydon's timeless designs are driven by the beauty of our surroundings and the strong shapes that are found everywhere, if we pay attention. The simplicity in the designs makes it easy to wear and combine the jewellery as you like. Our jewelry collections encapsulate nature's scenes and the beauty in our surroundings. When you wear a piece of jewellery from Pernille Corydon, you also carry a story with you - with memories to treasure, keep and remember.

A collection inﬂuenced from different countries, but with a pure and clean Scandinavian design. Our mission is to always offer our customers a trendy, affordable, comfortable and high quality product. Living in a challenging world we also have a strong focus in recycled and vegan certificated materials and sustainable production methods. Welcome to my world and the AW24 collection.

Pico is a Danish jewellery and accessory brand founded by Anne-Marie Pico in 2004. At Pico, we find that jewellery and accessories are a perfect and accessible way to express oneself. When and what kind of pieces people wear is very individual. We wish to create a ‘walk in closet’ of jewellery, timeless staples and trendy pieces for every mood and season. We therefor believe that prices need to be reasonable, without compromising on the quality of the materials we use.
INDUSTRY: Luxury Goods & Jewelry - Handcrafted Jewellery, Fine Jewellery, Jewellery, and fashion jewellery

DESCRIPTION: We are not just a clothing company, but a story made of passion, tradition and people. Pieffe Studio is a brand born in 2013 in Florence, from experience and passion for clothing. Craftsmanship and respect for Made in Italy are the highest corporate values, in fact all phases of the production chain are developed in Italy, with particular focus on companies located in the Tuscany area.

Pier St. Barth is a men's lifestyle brand which embodies the spirit and style of the beautiful St. Barth island in the French West Indies.Since launching his lifestyle brand in 2016, Andy Piers has been on a mission to create easy and stylish swim & resort wear apparel that effortlessly integrates into your everyday wardrobe.With that approach, Pier St. Barth embodies sophistication and ease offering versatile clothing that you can wear on a beach, by a pool or on weekends.

Embracing well-thought through tailoring practices, Pieszak is about redefining wardrobe essentials for enlightened and easy going, sophisticated women. Ranging from the affordable to the exclusive, each garment is a carefully selected gem in terms of fitting and making. Design elements, tailor practices and different materials encounter each other in surprising yet highly consistent ways. The Pieszak look is classic yet unmistakably touched by the present.

Pinetime Clothing, a Budapest-based technical streetwear brand, emerges from the passion of its owners and team dedicated to surfing, skating and snowboarding. This shared enthusiasm for nature forms the core concept, marrying the aesthetics of classic sports outerwear with traditional streetwear. Rooted in boardsports, our brand strives to infuse everyday city life with the spirit of outdoor adventures through extravagant yet comfortable and practical streetwear. Our mission revolves around promoting an active lifestyle, and we aim to revive the sense of outdoor exploration in urban settings. We recognize the demands placed on our clothing, rigorously testing materials for insulation, warmth, breathability, and durability to ensure optimal performance and an exceptional fit. Pinetime is committed to designing and crafting enduring, evergreen garments with sustainability at the forefront, utilizing industry-leading fabrics, materials and technologies. Join us in the journey where fashion meets nature, and adventure becomes a daily affair.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - Street Fashion

DESCRIPTION: Pius Gabor produces sneakers and casual boots for the quality-conscious man. Individual in design and high in quality. Only the best materials are used. We take sustainability and social commitment seriously. Ignoring tradition since 1919.

PLUSLAVIE ! PLUSLAVIE [ PLÜ ] designs garments in timeless and authentic shapes that give our customers the opportunity to feel completely comfortable and at the same time to be well dressed... PLUSLAVIE [ PLÜ ] is for all women from young to old, from petite to plump, from small to large and from classic to extravagant… PLUSLAVIE [ PLÜ ] does not follow any trends and is nevertheless changeable... We underline the unique look of every woman by individually combining the many lovingly hand-designed accessories, jewelry and patches. The customer herself becomes part of the daily design... We produce our designs in limited quantities in a modern family business in Izmir, Turkey to keep our clothes as unique as our customers. High-quality fabrics and careful processing are of particular value for PLUSLAVIE

The World’s First Couch Couture Company. Since 2015, Pockies champions comfy living, starting out with pocketed underwear. Our collection now includes Briefs, PJs, Gift Boxes, Heavyweight Joggersuits, Boxed Tees & Longsleeves, Thick Socks, Slides, and more. Are you looking for high quality, sustainably made homewear? We got you. Would you like your customers to look stylish and relaxed at the same time? Look no further. In search for the greatest gifts for special Holidays, Birthdays, Father’s days or other days? You’re welcome. Want our views on current geopolitical events? Sorry, we don’t know anything about that. What we do know is that, when you become a stockist, you will be joining a list of real nice stores already representing Pockies.
INDUSTRY: Apparel & Fashion - Marketing, E-commerce, Underwear, and Design

DESCRIPTION: The Brand Poetic Collective was founded by Tom Botwid during his time studying at the the art academy in Berlin. Poetic Collective is run from the Malmö office where we use the small-scale of the brand to our advantage. The focus is on creative graphics with an analog feeling, quality items and oversized silhouettes. Poetic Collective strives to be a sustainable brand. Large parts of the collection is produced in Europe from organic cotton and post consumer recycled polyester. Our philosophy of inclusivity and creativity is visible also in our diverse team of European skaters that is an integral part of the brand in every way.

Pont Neuf is easy-to-wear Danish-designed styles for women looking for distinctive clothes in sizes XS to 3XL (36-56). We aim to create individual items that look good on all sizes and shapes. We take all the advantages of plus-size design to create flattering and comfortable tunics, dresses, tops and blouses that give you a wonderful sense of freedom. A perfect combination of … - simple and stylish design - high quality and focus on natural, breathable fibres - expressive and powerful prints - great colours - 3D-structured fabrics ensures success with our unique Pont Neuf look. We also offer a wide selection of great classics through our extensive NOOS programme. All our styles can easily be transformed from day to evening wear, giving you a full palette of easy-to-wear fashion. All our styles have recognisable names for clarity and to ensure you get the right fit. And the styles you love most are repeated and redesigned for the following seasons, enabling you to buy your favourites over and over again. EASY TO WEAR – EASY TO LOVE Just like Pont Neuf – which is French for ‘new bridge’. We believe our strong concept of EASY-TO-WEAR fashio
Online store coming soon in 2024!

Transforming scents from carefully selected natural ingredients into intoxicating perfumes with complex notes, PORCELAIN combines the artisan skill of natural perfumery with the craftsmanship of delicate porcelain to reignite the ancient art of perfume making. Updating the ancient soul of perfumery to modern sensibilities, the result is a series of high-quality niche perfumes that allow each ingredient to have its moment on the skin, in the air and in your mind.

Pre End is a Danish design brand of high quality at an affordable price. The company was founded in 2001 and our journey has just begun. We are ambitious, which our success and extensive growth through the last 5 years can testify to. Pre End is a Danish design brand of high quality at an affordable price. The company was founded in 2001 and our journey has just begun. We are ambitious, which our success and extensive growth through the last 5 years can testify to.

Prinz Berlin is an accessory brand with the mission to reimagine iconic pieces with a contemporary twist. We believe in the power of a single accessory to transform any outfit - to elevate it from ordinary to extraordinary. We want to create casual yet sophisticated pieces that make the person wearing it feel effortlessly confident and strong. We like to say: It‘s your everyday cherry on top. Our collection boasts diverse designs, from sleek and minimalist to bold and statement-making, always utilizing high-quality and sustainable fabrics.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - Silk and Cashmere Accessories

DESCRIPTION: At PROJECT AJ117 we combine the best of Scandinavian Design traditions and simplicity with the European workmanship and finishings. Made in Europe is still a strong part of the brand DNA. We love to focus on sustainability and eco friendly production methods

Pure by Nat was first introduced at Copenhagen Fashionweek in January 2015. The look of my jewelry has always been a combination of both raw and feminine. I've always loved mixing the two styles, because that's the type of person I am. The majority of my jewelry is made on brass. Because here I have the opportunity to create jewelry with volume and raw surfaces. The jewelry is coated with either 24K gold plating or a silver coating.Finally, all the jewelry is given an E-coating to ensure a good durability of the coating. I work primarily with genuine natural stones, freshwater pearls, quartz and cubic zirconia. Some stones can be colored to achieve a specific expression. I think the stones and pearls give a beautiful feminine touch to the raw surfaces. All the jewelry is handmade. I am inspired by people. The cool type in the metro, the colorful one on the bike, the bohemian type in the café and the minimalist on the street. I can sit for hours at the airport, at the train station, on the bench in the street or in the café, looking at people. I use all these impressions to design my little stories in each collection.

In an area in the south-west corner of France called Landes, known for its history of goose and duck breeding, a family owned company started to make use of and refine the bi-product of this business – feathers and down. Today over some 160 years later Pyrenex is still a family-owned business of the 5th generation and has developed and perfected unique skills in producing the world’s finest down. While some of earliest down jackets ever produced came from the Pyrenex factories during WW2, during an extreme frigid winter to protect prisoners of war from the cold, their expertise later moved into producing duvets and pillows. Later in the 60’s when renowned French mountaineer Louis Audoubert was set to climb the Himalayas, Pyrenex decided to create their first expedition down jacket - tough, technical and warm enough to protect him from the harsh elements. Pyrenex is today one of Europe’s biggest and most advanced producer of premium down and feathers. With a rich history and expertise, sourcing from the best farms in the world at the foot of the Pyrenees and extensive research and know-how, Pyrenex has been able to produce an exceptional top-grade, high quality down used in their down jackets today.

Qnuz was established in 2008, and they now provides everything for the fashionable woman - shoes, bags, accessories, belt etc. Multiple times a year they develop new styles, including a large clothing collection. New styles arrive several times a month - all for immediate delivery.

Sustainable, canadian-made outerwear designed for the northern life. Today, we are designing with style, function and passion in mind as we aim for excellence in quality and spirit. As a meticulous Canadian fashion company, Quartz Co. brings a global perspective inspired by the people of today. We are a team of engineers and creatives who strive to make products for a generation of consumers who have a choice, who are informed and who value expertise and transparency. We can show the world all our employees who are a part of the foundation of this company. With products that are built to last, we are shaping the future of premium made-in-Canada manufacturing. Quartz Co. products are available in more than 300 stores in over 20 countries, including France, Germany, Japan, Korea, Norway, USA and Switzerland.

RAAW Alchemy is a Danish clean and natural beauty brand with a holistic approach towards healing and transforming skin. We work with nature's finest ingredients that are organic and sustainable, and our aim is to design products that you can use to create your very own beauty ritual. All ingredients are carefully selected for their individual superpowers and how they compliment each other for better results. Ingredients are never picked for their color or scent. RAAW Alchemy products are curated for specific skin needs, not to smell or look a certain way.

Fashion for every woman - since 1920. Sometimes elegant and classic, sometimes fancy and modern. Knitwear and shirts complemented by blouses, trousers and skirts. RABE creates women’s fashion that keeps you well dressed every day. RABE has a wide range of NOS pieces. This German brand has for many years been one of the top selling brands. Creating clothes which are comfortable to wear in exceptional quality and with an excellent fit – this defines the company’s successful presentation on the market for many years.

RAGBAG was founded in 2020 and is a Copenhagen-based Danish jewelry brand run by five creative souls with different backgrounds from the Fashion Industry. This passionate, diverse team brings their individuality, unique traits, and skills to the process of creation. Embracing individuality and utilizing differences to create unique and exciting jewelry, is what makes RAGBAG, not only a name, but also a reflection of the brand essence itself. The organic and detailed expressions in RAGBAG’s jewelry-design are created in a combination of traditional craft methods and modern techniques.

Founded in 2008 by Los Angeles native, Jeff Abrams, Rails has grown from a small label - started with just a single hat - into a full collection of women’s and men’s apparel. Sold at top international retailers and worn by a loyal following of celebrities and tastemakers, the brand has come to define a new classic heritage and relaxed sensibility. Rails, which started with a $5,000 investment, is now sold in 30 countries by more than 1000 retailers, including its own flagship stores in New York, San Francisco, Newport Beach, Paris, London and Amsterdam.

Rangel was born in a spirit of seasonless, timeless and streamlined resort fashion. Founded in 2021 by Isabela Rangel Grutman.  The ready-to-wear line focuses on elevated fabrications and warm-weather magnetism. At its heart, Rangel is inspired by Grutman’s home country of Brazil, by sun-seeking on faraway shores, and by an easygoing yet confident sense of simplicity. Rangel is deeply committed to sustainable and responsible practices. We strive to generate minimum production waste, meet ethical production standards, use earth-friendly textiles and guarantee fair wages.

RE:DESIGNED is a Danish established brand, designing and manufacturing handbags in quality leather. The brand was established in 2003 with a passion for slow fashion and an ambition to create a timeless and durable design in lasting patinated leather. All our designs are handmade in a close cooperation with our talented manufactures, designed and approved in our headquarter in Denmark. Quality is one of our core values, and will be found throughout all collections where the main characteristic is original soft grained leather in a patinated look that becomes more and more beautiful in time.

A wash process that exhibits the three dimensionality of true vintage - used finishes that include selective fading and whiskering the delicate quality of Japan lives within every feature. RED CARD takes the opposite approach from creating a denim that is plain work wear,and instead of pursuing only the functionality of the garment, it proposes an evolved REAL DENIM birthed from Japanese sensitivity.Possessing a high fashion literacy, RED CARD targets the fashion consciousthat can appreciate simplicity dyed with the essence of greatness.

Colorful fashion. The weather has been a great source of inspiration in the development of Regn’s functional raincoats for rainy and stormy days. Regn produces colorful, elegant, and high-quality rainwear devoted to delivering a stylish design to women around the world. Regn is sustainably developed and meets EU’s environmental and quality standards, including Oeko-Tex Standard 100. Regn takes technological fabrics specially designed for outdoor use and transforms them into modern clothing, without compromising on either style or the functional requirements of everyday wear. Regn products are versatile and comfortable to wear, designed in a delicate fashion and can be used whenever and wherever, with or without rain. Enjoy! We keep you dry and well-dressed. Let’s color the world! Danish design

Reign Italia is a contemporary denim brand with a vintage and gritty flavor. Since its inception in 2007, the brand has revolutionized the classic five-pocket jeans, showcasing an unmistakable style with refined treatments and meticulous attention to details. With a 100% Italian supply chain, Reign Italia combines innovation and tradition, experience and research, and technology and craftsmanship in their design and manufacturing process. The brand's collections go beyond denim, offering continuous garments and non-denim options such as colored trousers, sweatshirts, and t-shirts that stay true to their unique style.

Résumé is founded by two sisters, with one vision. Common genes, but twodifferent personalities creates the fusion that lays the foundation for the brand. This foundation was created in 2016. Résumé design collections that contain classic items and experimental key items, which add edge and personality to the brand.The Résumé woman is curious about fashion and trends, but also sets her basic wardrobe high. The collections therefore provide the opportunity for each woman to express and display her own personal style. Résumé is located in the heart of Copenhagen surrounded by cultural buildings and vibrant city life. The frame is set in an old, historic embassy building. Here Résumé has the opportunity to show every detail of the brand.

Rethinkit Studios is a Copenhagen based sports- and athleisure brand. We care about pre-loved and enviromentally friendly materials. We design and create things that lasts long and stays beautiful. Life time guarantee on all products.

The garments we do not design and produce ourselves, we handpick from a number of talented, creative suppliers in both Italy and France. Our focus is to find that little something extra for you. The products in interior design, fragrances and gardening come from our colleagues and friends in the industry. We choose the most beautiful, the best, the tastiest, the funnest, the most fragrant we can find - all for you and your home. We mainly sell to private individuals via our stores in Österlen (Hagestad) and here in our webshop.

Situated in Jutland, Denmark, Revolution have been making conscious streetwear based on a slow fashion principle since 1995. Driven by an ambition to provide affordable yet durable menswear to a style-considered consumer, Revolution's collections emphasize on expressive looks, comfortable fits and attention to details. Taking inspiration from cultural nostalgia, graphic design, urban sports and vintage clothing. Never wavering from the standpoint of being a staple Scandinavian streetwear label, Revolution continues to explore trends while holding on to the core identity and heritage of the brand.

Reyn Spooner greets you with inspired prints from the Islands of the South Pacific and Hawaii. Winding your way from Honolulu through green pineapple fields and past plantations-era buildings, you arrive at the North Shore, where there are endless white sand beaches with big water and even bigger waves. From Waimea Bay to Pipeline, from Haleiwa to Sunset Beach, we take you there with our classic and modern shirts. We've been around since 1956, proudly celebrating island life with our unique archival prints and inspired work of local artists. Hawaii is our source of inspiration and fine garment detailing will always be our passion and tradition. The Reyn Spooner tradition continues. A lot has changed since our earliest days on Waikiki Beach. Celebrities and Hawaii’s top surfers patronized the stand of Spooner’s of Waikiki. Known for our unique quality construction and custom print Hawaiian shirts for over 50 years.  Proud of our island heritage and the people of Hawaii. We remain steadfast in our uncompromising dedication to quality and look forward to your continued patronage of our Classic Collection Aloha shirts.  A new journey begins for Reyn Spooner with the debut of our Modern Collection Hawaiian shirts. Returning to our roots, yet modernizing through fit, fabrication, color and print style, a vision for our future. We’ve combined our passion for construction, traditional tailoring and a 1960’s preppy vibe with over 50 years of rich graphic archive prints. The result is a re-engineered, re-scaled and re-colored Aloha shirt collection, new and unique to a younger and more modern man.
INDUSTRY: Retail - Aloha Shirts, Swim Wear, Men's Clothing, Accessories, Kid's Clothing, and Women's Clothing

DESCRIPTION: At RHIZOME, we're on a mission to mend the fractures in the apparel industry. Our goal is to democratize access, allowing everyone to participate in the design, development and manufacturing process. We strive to provide a platform where innovation, personal expression, and sustainability thrive.We're committed to breaking down barriers, amplifying underrepresented voices, and fostering an inclusive and sustainable ecosystem. Through cutting-edge design and collaborative efforts, we empower individuals and brands to enter into the apparel market one idea at a time. We specialize in high performance and active wear, but we have developed products across the spectrum, from medical devices and outdoor gear, to automotive interiors. If it’s sewn, we can sew it.

Founded in 2003, Rhythm is a premium lifestyle brand with selective distribution worldwide. Rhythm draws on influences from art, music, travel and surf. Past, present and future.Rhythm's philosophy focuses on high quality collections carefully developed with an eye on future trends, sustainable practices and supporting a community of creatives. The brand has a strong appeal to an audience that aspires to or has an alternative coastal lifestyle.A Rhythm garment stands out for its elegance, timelessness, comfort, durability and signature style.

As a family business, RICOSTA has been producing fashionable children's shoes of outstanding quality for over 50 years.  Today RICOSTA is one of the most successful and popular children's shoe brands in Germany and internationally. The skills speak for themselves: Excellent fit and best wearing properties in a trend-oriented design.  The collections are developed and partly manufactured in Donaueschingen in the Black Forest.RICOSTA is one of the few shoe manufacturers that still produce in Germany itself and at its own certified locations in neighboring European countries.  With a clear commitment to ecology and fairness RICOSTA has been a pioneer in the shoe industry in terms of sustainability and corporate social responsibility for years.

Ril’s provides a full range of garments to create a total look for a modern woman for work, parties, weekends and holidays. The collection fulfils the commercial needs and expectations of the retailer and meets the needs of the modern female consumer. Ril's mission is to design and manufacture timeless pieces that can be worn and loved for long. We create design that lasts, materials that keep their shape and feel and impeccable fit. We hope that our pieces are kept consciously, and that can be given a second life by someone else.

Rita Row was born in Figueres (Girona, Spain) in June 2013 and is made of two halves: Imma Serra and Xènia Semis. Since its beginning, the brand has set a very clear goal: to create elegant, high-quality garments that promote ethical and sustainable fashion. The brand is committed to sustainable production and high-quality standards; which is an added value to their work philosophy. This is a project with an integral soul, that combines tradition, strong principles, design and exclusivity. The brand offers a new generation of high-quality clothing for women who look for a distinctive outfit. Rita is a woman who looks for comfort, quality and style behind every garment. This imaginary character is a source of inspiration to the Mediterranean designers made for a modern, hard-working, and free-spirited woman. Each collection is inspired by a theme, creating delicate and simple clothes with a contemporary, urban and comfortable elegance. The brand has a strong commitment with beauty: bringing peace and harmony to eyes, heart and reason. Rita Row’s unique positioning in the semi-luxury fashion segment allows it to offer high quality garments at a fair price, all the while being committed to ethical standards.

ROCKANDBLUE is represented by the people. The streets are the catwalks. Show the world who you are through fashion and wear what you want to be. Wherever life takes you, find strength in your true identity. For the coldest Nordic winters to the midnight sun of the brightest summers. From functional warmth to hardwearing toughness, to the bright colours of the lightest summers, we design for the days and nights of your life, whatever they bring. Our lives are full of change. So when life changes, change with it.

ROHDE: This is German Engineered Comfort. Since 1862.ROHDE is an internationally renowned manufacturer of high-quality footwear and one of the best-known German brands for sandals, slippers and comfort shoes. For more than 150 years, ROHDE has been influencing the shoe industry both in Germany and internationally, driving it forward with innovations at the product and manufacturing levels. ROHDE stands for uncompromising quality made in Europe, unmatched comfort and standard-setting customer centricity.

The ROKA London brand embolden! We want people to feel able to express themselves and live life in colour – and we'll have their back on the way. We want you to feel bold and proud when you wear a ROKA London bag. Confident that the important things you entrust it to carry are safe. ROKA London is for everyone, for every day, for everything.

Bio2™Textile: uniquely sustainable bio-based textile fiber for a cleaner world The production and use of textile fibres, such as polyester and cotton, is unsustainable in terms of water and chemical use, as well as emissions. At the same time, we waste millions of tons of straw – mostly by burning it, causing severe pollution problems. We at Fortum turn this problem into a solution. Our Bio2™Textile uses straw, that typically discarded as agro-residue, as its raw material. Replacing fossil-based raw materials with this residue reduces land degradation and deforestation. We apply a unique technology that achieves raw material efficiency of up to 90%, minimizing the amount of waste and the environmental impact from CO² emissions, water consumption and use of chemicals. All this contributes to the textile’s excellent life-cycle assessment (LCA) results.  he biomass-based Bio2™Textile fibers can replace unsustainable materials in numerous applications. Combining agro-residue-based raw material with sustainable fiber technology presents an answer to the urgent need to replace the unstainable textile materials currently on the market. The Bio2™Textile fiber offers high quality, renewable and recyclable solution that has never been seen before. It satisfies the growing need of sustainable textile fibers.

The oldest way to be in motion, presented from a fresh perspective. rollingsoft is a shoe brand, a technology – and a philosophy of movement. rollingsoft shoes combine the benefits of a roll over shoe with a particularly flexible sole design. This combines freedom of movement and lateral stability – to provide an incomparable feeling when walking.

Romantico Romantico Studios embodies the spirit of Luxembourg and la joie de vivre of its founder Fanny Bervard through a collage of various stylistic, linguistic, cultural influences and inspirations. Fanny’s creative mind and passion for statement jewelry guided her in building her own brand, in early 2019, after gaining professional experiences in fashion in New York, Berlin and Milano.Opulent pearls and gems are boldly mixed with clarity of form. Contemporary design is refined with traditional materials and craftsmanship. Inspired by sailing Capri’s azure blue sea, the smell of Sicily’s orange groves or tanning in the south of France, Mediterranean temperament and minimalistic modernity are naturally translated into a range of unique pieces.Based in the heart of Luxembourg, all styles are designed & assembled by Fanny herself in Romantico Romantico's petit atelier. Combining one of a kind fresh water baroque pearls, semi-precious stones or crystals

Love is a danish brand, who mainly produce super soft prewashed cotton in Portugal, the most delicate, soft like butter, oeko tex certified 100% mongolian cashmere knit. All our designs, such as knit, sweats, T-shirts or jackets are made with the heart.

Established in 2004 i Copenhagen. Rosemunde is rooted in Scandinavian values and inspired by the incredible architecture and design legacy we're surrounded by. The tradition of classic, timeless design, impeccable quality and finish are part of our core values. The collections embrace an elegant modern wardrobe with relaxed silhouettes in high quality fabrics and refined details, reimagining the classics. Sophisticated comfort, fluidity and femininity are attitudes that never fails to seduce. The styles are made with care and responsibility, and every piece that have the Rosemunde name has a purpose. Everyday luxury has always been at the forefront of Rosemunde, and we've become the natural choice for luxury essentials for woman worldwide. We believe flattering silhouettes should be ageless. Our values are: We're feminine at the core. We deliver long lasting quality. We're curious and confident. We commit to being responsible an inclusive.

Royal RepubliQ thoughtfully creates timeless designs with a Scandinavian approach. Crafted to last and stay relevant. We look ahead with an open mind and aim to create balance between past, present and future tendencies. Our Scandinavian roots reflect simplicity, functionality and heritage with a rebellious edge.
INDUSTRY: Footwear and Fashion - Leather footwear, bags and accessories

DESCRIPTION: Rubber Duck is a Danish sports fashion footwear brand that has taken the world by storm with its hip and colourful winter gear. Originated in the 80’s culture, jogging became popular; the need for a jogging shoe grow to enter the winter landscape. Therefore they invented a hybrid of a Moon Boot and a running shoe. SnowJoggers® was born. The most celebrated product, the Rubber Duck SnowJoggers, has become a winter must-have, spotted on celebrities like Lindsay Lohan, Katherine Heigl, Paris Hilton, The Kardashian’s and One Direction, to name a few. The Rubber Duck SnowJoggers is warm, cosy and smart. They have synthetic fur lining and an internal water-resistant membrane that ensures the boots are water-resistant. They are developed with a shock-absorbing FlexFoam midsole and the rubber ‘Duck Tread’ outsole for better traction and leave small duck prints in the snow.

“Rudolph Care is a family of beauty products combining exclusive luxury with sustainability, responsibility and transparency. We go out of our way to ensure that effectiveness, consistency and aesthetics are in harmony and that our products are developed with as much consideration for the natural world as for your health. We started off with skincare for face and body. Since then, we have added sun cream, hair care and a line of fragrances. I am extremely proud of all the products in the Rudolph family – and it comes straight from the heart when we write the message: ‘Rudolph Care – since 2009 for generations to come’ on each and every product.” - Andrea Elisabeth Rudolph, founder of Rudolph Care

We are a Danish brand merging aesthetic Scandinavian fashion and comfort. We value simplicity and timeless designs combined with sophisticated femininity. Our aim is to design a long lasting, loved, and unique wardrobe with pieces that brighten up the closet, to use season after season. For each collection we carefully select high quality fabrics, expressive details, and playful colors, into an ideal match of fit, comfort and feminine aesthetic. Our designs work across multiple occasions depending on how you style them. Towards a more responsible future, we produce small quantities to avoid waste – and we will always choose quality over quantity.

Rumpl is a Portland, OR-based company with a mission to introduce the world to better blankets.We pair technical materials found in premium outdoor gear with bold, exciting aesthetics to update a centuries-old and dated blanket category. Our products blur the line between indoor comfort and outdoor performance, keeping you comfortable anywhere you go, or when you don’t go anywhere.As a certified Benefit Corporation, we meet the highest standards of social and environmental performance, transparency and accountability. We offset our entire carbon footprint each year and donate 1% of all sales to environmental causes.

S+ by Zusse was founded in 2022, in Copenhagen, by owner Zusse Durbahn. Zusse herself was born and raised in Greenland, where she has her beautiful culture and nature in the back of her hand, with a strong connection to everything organic, where the many styles have been created. S+ By Zusse , has long been a wish, in fact since she was young, she has sewn and knitted most of her clothes.The brand was created because we think there is a lack of a raw look, for women with beautiful round shapes and who dare a little more. With us, you'll find a black clothing style - that's because we think it's elegant, classic, timeless, light and comfortable, which fits all wardrobes. It can be toned up or down, with different accessories.

S.T. Valentin is not business as usual. At first glance, you might take our products for classic men’s wear. And they are. But they are also not. They are our rethought bold versions of classics that never go out of style. The centre of our universe is our own shoe collection: Re-designed classics to fit any wardrobe and style. From classic gentleman to edgy rock ’n roller. We aim to create products you will be wanting to wear forever. By adding contemporary thoughts and modern materials to timeless classics, we create footwear that will not wear you out. S.T. Valentin is not just your conventional fashion statement. We are free-thinking visionaries and aesthetic perfectionists with a love for style and comfort. Our approach to men’s wear is similar to that of the fine art professional: We curate a collection of essentials that are not dictated by trends and tendencies. They are stylish and perfect in their own right. S.T. Valentin was founded in 2008 on vision, creative urge and pure passion. But community has been the most important driving force from day one. Everything is done in close dialogue with our loyal but brutally honest posse. Boots have been put to the test and hard truths have been spilled. We wouldn’t want it any other way. We welcome uncompromising gentlemen, laid back flâneurs and everyone in between.

Saburo, established in 2020, emerged with a clear purpose to provide exceptional products prioritizing impeccable fit and superior fabric quality. As we mark our third year, Saburo transforms remarkably while staying true to its fundamental values. Our brand is now reimagined with a fresh, contemporary vision, harmoniously blending tradition and innovation, bringing you an elevated denim experience. As part of this exciting rebranding, we proudly introduce our highly anticipated women's collection.

Women’s clothing for the individual, not the crowd. Sahara is renowned for creating contemporary designer fashion with a unique, bohemian-chic aesthetic inspired by the spirit of adventure, global design and unbounded creativity.
STREET: C/o SRLV Elsley Court, Great Titchfield Street

DESCRIPTION: Muted neutrals meet classic coat styles and supreme comfort, but there is no question of restraint here. Saint Jacques is making an impression with styles in striking, often oversized, cuts. Detailed designs in selected materials such as boiled wool or a fine brushed fabric let feminine, elegant looks appear in a new casual, even sporty light.

Since 1889, SAINT JAMES has been manufacturing, in its workshops in Normandy, next to the famous Mont Saint Michel, the authentic sailor sweater, knitted in virgin wool, as well as the striped t-shirt and the peacoat, both of which have become iconic pieces of fashion all over the world. Through each of its women's, men's and children's collections, this Norman house has been reinterpreting maritime fashion with authenticity, know-how and creativity for more than 130 years. In recognition of its remarkable knitting know-how, Saint James has received the national award of Entreprise Patrimoine Vivant (Living Heritage Company).

Saint Steve is born and raised in the Netherlands. We are knitwear only. It is made with dedication. With an eye for detail. Only the best yarns are good enough for our garments. This premium knitwear brand is designed for the fashion-conscious man who takes value in comfort and looking good. Saint Steve; an addition for any man’s wardrobe. Only available in the best fashion stores.

Saint Tropez was established in 1986 in the seaside village of Hornbæk–Denmark’s equivalent to Saint Tropez, France –as a dynamic high-street fashion brand. In 2019 Saint Tropez joined DK Company and hereby became a part of the group´s platform of strong fashion player in the mid-market segment. Today, Saint Tropez is an international brand designed in Denmark. The collections have a touch of feminine meets casual-cool and reflect the latest fashion trends.

In fashion, beauty is in the eye of the beholder, but quality should never be a compromise. No matter what you're looking for, we guarantee durability. We are committed to providing you styles that have quality built in and will last through the wear and tear of your day. Our goal is to put the fun in functional fashion. We know that looking stylish can make your whole day better; that's why we're committed to being your source for the newest trends. We design clothing you love so you can focus on looking great!

SAKI Sweden is a Scandinavian fashion brand founded in 1987. The SAKI brand is targeted at the fashion interested and trend-conscious, modern and elegant customer. The design is classic but with modern influences and a Scandinavian twist. SAKI Sweden is offering different types of outerwear and leather garments where styling, fit and material selection of the products stand for elegancy and quality, made for the daily life.

If you’re reading this, you’ve probably heard about us at some point in your life. If you haven’t, that’s alright: here are some facts and titbits about us that you might find interesting. And even if you have heard about us, keep reading anyway as you might just learn something new! Salsa is a Portuguese brand that makes the best fitting jeanswear for all body types that leaves you looking your absolute best and ready to rock. Denim is at our core, as is your confidence and comfort - which are taken into account in every stitch. Open since 1994, we have been innovating for over 29 years. But don’t take our word for it, the awards we’ve won in innovation, quality and fit speak for themselves.Today, we are part of the SONAE group and are present in more than 35 countries with over 350 points of sales. We (proudly) still have a large part of our operations based in Portugal.
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - Apparel & Fashion; Denim and Fashion & Retail - Jeanswear

DESCRIPTION: SANDGAARD A/S is a private owned company that was established in 2005 in Glyngøre – Denmark, under the name of GOZZIP® Today the name has changed to SANDGAARD. Our company provide affordable fashion for women in all shapes and sizes. We have 3 different brands which all are addresses ladies in any shape, size, color or religion. SANDGAARD take pride in working with suppliers who are proud of their production, and who take responsibility when it comes to child labour, forbidden materials, dye stuff etc. Through our Code of Conduct, we ensure a stable force of suppliers, who we visit on a regular basis to make sure our demands are kept
INDUSTRY: Retail Apparel and Fashion - plus size, fashion, and design

DESCRIPTION: At Sanita, our design and construction are second-to-none—and have been for more than 110 years. Featuring only the highest-quality leathers and handcrafted by cobblers in Europe, our clogs provide superior support and comfort to professionals in all types of industries.Imitation is the sincerest form of flattery. Don’t let other clogs fool you: at Sanita, you know that you are getting a quality shoe that has been made by traditional shoemakers, for you. Designed and manufactured in Europe since our first pair, Sanita clogs carry a heritage and commitment to authenticity that informs everything we do.

In 2019, Sanjo was acquired by a business group from Braga.  With a young and dynamic team, the focus became on bringing Sanjo back home.  The process of having entirely Portuguese production begins and, working with a factory in Felgueiras, Sanjo once again becomes made in Portugal.  The vulcanized sole was lost, introducing a glued sole with greater environmental awareness, still maintaining the typical rubber and canvas that are so distinctive of Sanjo, which have accompanied generations.  It is this generational work that we intend to continue by building more than a simple sneaker - building a legacy.  Sanjo didn't just come back - she came back and came back with the desire to grow, evolve and continue to write a story at the feet of the Portuguese.

Made in Sätila, Sweden. Sätila was founded in 1896 and presents a wide range of designed knitted accessories and garments with a focus on urban outdoor, we are a company built on sustainability and with a high social responsibility. We embrace our heritage of craftsmanship and together with modern technology we can create outdoor garments and accessories for many occasions at our factory in Sätila. Welcome to meet us at CIFF!

At Satorisan, we create products that last. Designing and crafting shoes that are comfortable. With a fit and finish that only get better with age. Our attention to detail creates singularity. While our planet-friendly process means we take care. We look to the future with hope, and turn our backs on fear. Helping everyone to walk consciously and live from the heart. We encourage you to follow the path of life and celebrate its twists and turns. Whatever journey you're on, we'll be right there with you.

SAYÉS' nature begins in the milieu of everyday existence, appreciating and  celebrating the tactility, aesthetics and genius of ordinary objects and their contrasting materials. We believe that the real charm is attained when mundane things are presented to the mind in an unusual way. SAYÉS is defined by attention to detail and inspired by contemporary culture in every sense; curated urban expressions, art and architecture. Holding a genuine desire to create functional designs of uncompromising quality, we develop pieces with  a timeless perspective, yet distinctly unique, to be lived in and made to last accompanying you everyday to elevate your laid back look. SAYÉS offers canvas fabrics balanced with premium calf leather featuring remarkable and mostly conrast coloured stitching. Handcrafted by the finest artisans creating ideal sized and vibrantly colored bags; SAYÉS  is a perfect blend of modern twists and playfulness.

Inspired by Scandinavian design as it emerged in the 1950's, we like the idea that beautiful and functional everyday objects should be made available to everyone. We strive to create products with great value for money – without making compromises. We belive that patience is a virtue and pay great attention to detail and materials. Dedicated work and research has been put into the details of our products – for you to feel and appreciate the difference from the moment you start wearing a Scandinavian Edition jacket. We have designed our jackets to give people living in urban environments an alternative to the traditional wool coat – a perfect mix between refined style and practical function.

We help retailers and webshops create vivid packaging experiences through innovative and inspiring packaging design. We are your strategic and creative packaging partner and help you with everything from the idea to finished production and distribution of your packaging. Consumers experience your packaging as part of your print, and this helps define their perception of your company. Packaging represents your brand’s physical dimension. Consumers have an intuitive sense of who you are when they get hold of your packaging. They can feel the quality and see the aesthetic details in the design. Since 1988, we have secured high-quality packaging for multiple sectors, and today we are one of Scandinavia’s largest providers of store and webshop packaging. We design and stock a comprehensive range of wrapping paper, boxes, ribbon, wine packaging, and all the other accessories needed to create a complete and coherent packaging solution for your store and webshop.

Scholl is the emblematic footwear brand with more than 100 years of experience, handcrafted & designed in Italy. The brand’s past is translated in highly contemporary styles that capture the spirit of the 21st century defined by the double duty approach of taking you from your home to the streets, from the relaxed indoors to the great outdoors and from the country to the city. Building on their heritage, Scholl uses the Scholl Pescura style as the centerpiece of future collections. This must-have piece gets complimented with seasonal styles that fit our brand DNA, focusing on both top comfort & style. Over the years, the who’s who of Hollywood have all been wearing the brand’s ‘Scholl Pescura’, which irrefutably is a must-have. Everyone from Audrey Hepburn to Twiggy, to Jennifer Aniston or Sara Jessica Parker. They love its comfort, fashionable design and versatility.

Scotch & Soda celebrates the free spirit of Amsterdam. Endlessly optimistic, we’re inspired by the liberal outlook of our home city, championing individuality, authenticity and the power of self-expression to create the unique – an attitude reflected in our designs.

Seamless Basic celebrate responsible women. We believe in a future where people buy less with respect for the ressources. Acting through a conscious sourcing of natural quality materials and by investing in better product care information we aim to contribute to changing the consumer patterns. The brand offers you a wardrobe of exclusive essentials. Built on the love of natural materials and on thirty years of knowledge working with quality textiles. Natural materials are easier to recycle. That's why all products are crafted from extraordinary fabrics like extra fine cotton, mulesing free merino wool, recycled silk and Mulberry silk. Every item is based on seamless crafting methods which means less stitching, less fabric waste and more comfort. Based on a simple one-size concept Seamless Basic has rethought the basics around comfort and fitting. One single collection made for everyday and for after-hours. Delicate, luxurious and way beyond basic. Designed with a classic twist and a seasonless mindset. Never out of stock and never out of fashion.

Sebago was founded in 1946 by the three friends Daniel J. Wellehan, Sr., William Beaudoin and Joseph Cordeau, all three born and raised in New England. The first shoe they launched was a hand-stitched penny loafer. Sebago's penny loafer was inspired by the popular Native American moccasin and featured for the first time the company's patented method of joining the sole, brim and upper leather together. It was a great success. With a strong starting point in quality and style, Sebago expanded rapidly. In 1954, they completed the production of their 1,000,000th shoe, and Sebago shoes were sold in the largest American department stores. Throughout the 1950s and 1960s, Sebago expanded their collection with new models for women and began exporting abroad. In 1970, Sebago launched their most recognizable shoe to date: the iconic Dockside sailing shoe. Known for its hand-stitched moccasin construction, non-slip rubber sole and stainless eyelets, the Docksides remain an iconic silhouette worn by men, women and children alike

Second Female creates feminine and sophisticated easy-to-wear essentials. Designed in a beautiful palette of soft colors and refined prints. Underlining the Scandinavian values of effortless luxury and functionality, we create collections that are classical in a contemporary context, always focusing on this season´s “must have” items. Signature silhouettes include feminine blouses, everyday dresses and fashionable knitwear. Our design philosophy and aim is to create a relevant wardrobe that embodies all the comfort and confidence, a woman needs to express her personal appearance.

Created in 2006, SEE U SOON embodies the essence of Parisian fashion. The brand has conquered the hearts of women looking for fashion that is both chic and relaxed with a French touch. Halfway between timeless vintage and the latest trends, SEE U SOON offers collections that reflect light, modern and romantic elegance.

For over 125 years, SEEBERGER has stood for hats and caps that set standards. The family business is now in its fourth generation. Our primary goal is to offer a wide range of customers hats and caps of the highest quality in trend-conscious design as well as excellent and comprehensive service. We realise this goal with our motivated and committed employees and state-of-the-art infrastructure at our site in Germany as well as reliable partners all over the world. We have been producing hats and headwear in Weiler im Allgäu since 1890. From hats, caps, beanies, headbands, scarves and gloves to bags, fascinators / hair jewellery and accessories - we have the right companion for every season and every occasion. In addition to flappers, fedoras, bell hats, bonnets, trilbys, pork pies, bogart hats, matelots and elegant pillboxes, we offer new, trendy and individual hat models every season to add the finishing touch to your own personal look.
Selehatin is the oral luxury brand. With a series of curated whitening toothpastes, mouthwashes and oral sprays the brand has the ambition to elevate the emotional experience of everyday ceremonies.

Selfhood is an expression of simple sophistication with an element of surprising detail. The style consists of feminine shapes mixed with a more pragmatic and edgy cut borrowed from menswear. We achieve simple sophistication with timeless designs, and a nerdy attention to detail. Always while considering practicality in use. In our enabling endeavor, we design outerwear for the individual, creating styles that will seamlessly adapt to your personal style. This is what we call Studio of Individualism. Based on a slow fashion principle we produce conscious outerwear for the style-savvy consumer. We focus solely on outerwear, meaning we are experts when it comes to creating durable outerwear, with attention to functionality in use. We are not afraid to repeat styles, as we trust our designs to be strong enough to last through erratic design trends. But we like to explore and push the limits, so each collection will be a further and improved version of our previous collection.

With roots dating back to 1885, SERAFINI stands as a distinguished luxury brand hailing from Italy. Since its inception, the brand has undergone a transformative journey, evolving into a high-quality shoemaking company that epitomizes excellence in craftsmanship. Notably, in 1932, Calzaturificio Aretino was established, marking a significant milestone in the brand's commitment to producing top-tier footwear. Under the visionary leadership of Fabrizio Serafini, the brand has become a tangible expression of his multifaceted life journey. A sportsman, traveler, and creative personality, Serafini has left an indelible mark on the world of luxury footwear. In the early 90s, he redefined the sneaker, drawing inspiration from vintage models and infusing them with innovative features, all while adhering to artisanal production methods. SERAFINI's identity is characterized by a commitment to unusual materials, innovative colors, intricate embroideries, and meticulous attention to quality.
INDUSTRY: Footwear Manufacturing - 100% Italian handmade sneakers, sneakers, boots, mocassins, calzature uomo, and calzature donna

DESCRIPTION: Sessùn has been creating subtle and unique fashion for women for more than 25 years now. Playing with volumes and textures, reinventing the classics and the codes of masculine/feminine styles, Sessùn distills the story of a free-spirited and inspired woman. Consciously engaged since day one in a responsible approach centered on quality and the promotion of craftsmanship, Sessùn stands out for its acute attention to detail, its preservation of core values and the expansion of its universe to a genuine and sensitive art of living. Embodied by the Sessùn Alma boutique, this lifestyle also shines through the community of artists and craftsmen who have actively accompanied Sessùn's growth. Sessùn is distributed in over 400 points of sale in France and abroad, through its own-name boutiques, corners and multi-brand stores.

SHAPE REGIME debuts next generation of the ultimate tool for shape-support of sneakers. Born out of a great love for sneakers, for premium technical innovation and with a pounding shoe-makers heart, SHAPE REGIME is here with a mission to make your sneakers stand proud and tall.

SHEPHERD® Where Tradition Meets Scandinavian Elegance Our journey begins with the selection of the finest sheepskin and wool, materials known for their durability and natural elegance. These materials are the cornerstone of our product range, offering an unparalleled level of comfort and style. The skilled hands of our artisans transform these raw materials into exquisite pieces, ensuring that every product embodies our dedication to craftsmanship.

It was in the 1950’s that Herman decided to change the direction of the company and started to focus on fashionable women footwear. The stiletto came to play an important role in securing the company’s position on the Danish market during the 1960’s, as Gardenia Copenhagen were among the first players to introduce high heels and pointy toes in Denmark. By focusing on consistency and remaining faithful towards its roots – Gardenia Copenhagen managed to establish itself as one of the most successful shoe brands on the market. 76 years later, Gardenia Copenhagen remains a key player within the Danish fashion industry. A key success-factor has been the company’s ability to stay curious and alert to its external environment.

Shoedesign Copenhagen er et af Danmarks førende fashion footwear brands, som er blevet et kendt og meget populært brand i modebranchen. Shoedesign Copenhagen er specialiserede i at designe sko, sandaler, loafers og støvler. Moderigtige styles til den modebevidste kvinde. Shoedesign Copenhagen henvender sig til den modebevidste kvinde. Med Shoedesign Copenhagen fodtøj går du aldrig galt i byen. FOOTWEAR med stil og et feminint touch. Mangler du nye moderigtige kvalitets sandaler, sko, loafers eller støvler, som samtidig matcher tidens hotteste tendenser, så kan vi uden tvivl anbefale Shoedesign Copenhagen. Støvlerne kan bruges til både fint, hverdag og casual brug - det er kun fantasien der sætter grænser.

The Signature collection is aimed at the grown-up woman. With flattering feminine silhouettes, versatile styles and comfortable quality and fit. With our passion for print and colours we create a modern yet timeless look that will get you noticed. SIGNATURE styles have high attention to quality and fit, and with these styles we strive to make you feel your best. Enjoy our classics and explore our thrilling new designs. If you feel good, you look your best.

SILFEN is a Danish designer brand focusing on innovative bags and ready-to-wear SILFEN Studio is driven by the two Silfen siblings Daniel & Celine. SILFEN was founded in 2013 by Daniel and later joined by his sister, Celine, which initiated the name change to SILFEN Studio. SILFEN is an innovative affordable fashion brand that designs quirky and experimental bags with focus on functionality and quality. All bags are handcrafted from innovative and mostly recycled materials, and they are all 100% vegan. We specialize in designing stylish and functional bags, where experimental creativity meets Danish design. A SILFEN bag is not just practical - it completes your outfit. We use loyal and inspiring ambassadors to show our community how a bag can be an essential addition to any outfit. We want to prove that sustainability can be for everyone, and that good quality does not have to comprise with the price. It's about clever design and good, close partnerships.

Sioux is one of the smallest remaining shoe manufacturers in Germany. The traditional Swabian company is independent and has developed an interesting niche with its moccasin production. Sioux is proud of its long tradition and independence as one of the last remaining German shoe manufacturers.

SISSEL EDELBO is born out of the friendship between childhood friends Jeanne Sissel Thomsen and Christina Edelbo in 2004 with the vision of creating a fashion brand based on pure values. Behind SISSEL EDELBO today stands Jeanne Sissel Thomsen and Chris Elmengaard, whose work have targeted the combination of sustainable materials, dressy silhouettes, and a trendy bohemian lifestyle since 2004. A vision of making a fashion brand built on clean, sustainable values combined with a preference for feminine and colourful prints and sustainable textiles. In large part due to a responsible approach to every part of the chain of values – from production to the people involved, collections designed from vintage material, made to last season after season, as well as a preference for good craftsmanship – SISSEL EDELBO has become synonymous with responsible fashion.

Sisters Point is all about fun and fast fashion with a twist of the iconic Scandinavian style. We interpret the trends as soon as they hit the catwalk and design fashion for women on time, without blowing your budget! No annual collections - simply just the right trend at the right time.

The origins of the Sita Murt firm date back to 1924 when Antonio Esteve Aguilera inaugurated the textile factory.  The brand took a radical turn when, in the 80s, designer Sita Murt, wife of Toni Esteve Enrich, joined, bringing a new personality to the design.  The consolidation took place in 2004, launching Sita Murt as an international fashion brand. Sita Murt wants to be a tribute to fighting women, who pursue their dreams and are true tightrope walkers of emotions.  To build Sita Murt's “natural chic” style we use only quality materials and manufacture in nearby workshops.  Each garment is considered a small success of our brand. To achieve this, we have an expert and passionate group of people, professionals who ensure the effectiveness of each of the stages at all times.  At Sita Murt we do not delegate any of the key processes.  We like to take charge and take care of them all, because they are all important for the final result. We are installed in two work centers located in Igualada: the Central Offices, within the city, and the Logistics Warehouse, in the industrial estate.

Sittingsuits ApS was founded in 2019 by two visionary entrepreneurs, Rebecca Garde Johansen and Vibe Johansson. We are a Danish company on a compelling mission: to revolutionize outdoor comfort while emphasizing sustainability. Our specialty lies in providing a sustainable alternative to blankets and outdoor heating for restaurants, hotels, and other outdoor settings. Sittingsuits are not only more efficient and environmentally friendly than traditional outdoor heating methods, but they also offer an added layer of warmth, ensuring comfortable seating. By using Sittingsuits, businesses can extend their outdoor serving hours and seasons but also demonstrate a strong alignment with environmental concerns. This sends a clear message to customers about the importance of caring for our planet and environment. With heaters being banned in some European countries, Sittingsuits present a compliant and sustainable solution for those seeking alternatives for their outdoor seating areas. Additionally, the product offers a unique branding opportunity for businesses, allowing them to easily customize with their own logo and stand out to make a statement about their brand.

Six Ámes was founded in 2014 with the mission to deliver comfortable - yet chic - clothes for all types of women, making them feel empowered every day. With a distinct design expression of luxurious everyday apparel, the Six Ámes aesthetic is elegant with clean lines and feminine shapes brought to life in luxurious, high-quality fabrics, at affordable prices. Our brand name, Six Ámes, meaning ‘six souls’ in French, embodies both our design philosophy and our distinctive blend of French elegance and femininity with Danish minimalism and craftsmanship. At Six Ámes, we strive to create clothing that empowers women, making them feel confident and at ease in their own skin. We celebrate diversity and individuality, recognizing that clothing is not just a means of covering our bodies but a medium for expressing our personalities and sharing our souls with the world.

Sports Connection ApS is a subsidiary of the American footwear brand SKECHERS in the Nordic countries. We operate more than 60 SKECHERS stores in Denmark, Sweden, Norway, Finland and in Northern Germany, and SKECHERS online stores in Denmark, Sweden, Norway, and Finland. Our products are also distributed through a strong wholesale footprint, of more than 1,600 retailers in the shoe- and sports industry in the Nordic countries. SKECHERS is the World's third largest footwear brand, sold in over 180 countries and in 2022, 266.8 million pairs of SKECHERS were sold worldwide, through multi-brand shoe stores, sports shops, department stores and online, and, in more than 4,992 SKECHERS concept stores around the world. SKECHERS USA, Inc., based in Manhattan Beach in California, designs, develops, and markets a broad range of lifestyle-, fashion- and leisure shoes men, women, and children, and is an established footwear brand in the performance segment with functional golf-, running-, walking-, and training shoes. Stylish and innovative quality footwear with exceptional comfort, for every occasion.

Anything in life has to have a purpose. SKFK has a purpose; to show the industry change can be made; that our negative impacts can be reverted; that art, design and innovation can be at the forefront of regenerative fashion. Since 1999, we have been working for a different fashion: creative, timeless and with a unique identity. We encourage you to express your nature through timeless and unique pieces. We do not support the ideas that fast fashion has imposed on the mass consumption of garments and the little use that is made of them. We close the loop on production, including responsible manufacturing, use, and end-of-life for every garment.

Knitwear since 1972 - a family business! Skovhuus is a Danish knitwear collection of the highest quality. Knitwear with elegance, style and exquisite details. Skovhuus is for women who prefer a modern appearance and a relaxed feeling and who simply want to feel good in a well-designed fit. Skovhuus is a family business with a successful 50-year tradition. With our production in Denmark and Europe, we are close to the product and can develop unique designs for every season.
INDUSTRY: Apparel & Fashion - Knitwear, Outdoor fashion, Specializing in knitwear

DESCRIPTION: Sleeper is an authentic mid-luxury brand dedicated to crafting garments for life's celebrations. Mission — Inspire through our craft, turning daily moments into celebrations of individuality and life. Sleeper is a mid-luxury brand crafted for life's celebrations, authentically merging comfort and style, seamlessly reimagined for both day and night.

When you buy a pair of Sneaky Steve, you become a natural part of our belief that good shoes come from the heart, soul and dirty hands of people with real passion.  Like us, you believe that no computer or automated production line can replace the human body, brain and genuine emotion.  And because of that, you wear your Sneaky Steves with pride, knowing you're wearing something truly authentic and well-made in a world of mass-produced disposables.  Gothenburg, the city where Sneaky Steve was born, has always played an important role in our history.  With its industrial heritage, rainy winters and heavy salty winds, the city has always been our inexhaustible source of inspiration.  Just like all the hardworking heroes who have kept the city alive over the years.  But Gothenburg is so much more than a gray sky and cold concrete.  It is a city where many different subcultures thrive, with a vibrant music scene and where many fashion designers have begun their journey to international success.

Snoot stands for innovation, quality, and functionality. Snoot has always challenged itself to protect the brand's uniqueness while continuously evolving. Since the company's founding in 2009, Snoot's vision has been to combine the stringent demands of functionality and durability in the sportswear industry with an eye for detail and fashion consciousness in the fashion industry. This vision resulted in beautifully designed clothing with a modern fit combined with a high level of functionality. In the winter of 2018, a repositioning of the brand began. Snoot's products take on an increasingly distinct and exclusive style. The company has followed a clear and simple philosophy: to create unique products of the highest quality, timeless, versatile, and innovative. Sport, comfort, quality, and consistency have always been the distinct characteristics of the Snoot brand, which has been able to evolve over the years while remaining consistent with its heritage, in a constant quest for ongoing dialog with its many consumers worldwide. We strive to frequently redefine the Snoot brand and remain consistent with its history and DNA by adopting a new way of doing business.

Out of sheer enthusiasm for creating functional products, Japanese outdoor specialist Yukio Yamai in 1958 founded one of the world's most authentic, functional and stylish outdoor brands under the name Snow Peak. Today - more than 60 years later - Snow Peak is still an independent family-owned company with design and functionality in focus. What characterizes Snow Peakis the minimalist design fused with advanced technology that perfectly spans the gap between performance and lifestyle. And it is this fusion that makes Snow Peak one of the most exciting and timeless constellations in outdoor and in fashion right now. the next generation of the Yamai legacy is being brought forward by Yukio's granddaughter, Lisa Yamai, who in 2014 launched Snow Peak Apparel. With great acclaim from the fashion and outdoor industries. In addition to presenting a full range of camping products, snow peak will also feature men and women's outdoor apparel and their hardware products distinctive for their minimalist design and state-of-the-art technology.

In august 2002 the renowned haute couture designer Isabel Kristensen collaborates with IC Company to launch ”O by Isabel Kristensen”. The original concept was to create a ‘bridge’ between the luxury world of haute coture and the affordable high-street. In July 2005 Isabel Kristensen leaves IC Company and the brand is reborn as ”Soaked In Luxury”. In 2014 DK Company acquire the brand from IC Group. Today, the creative direction of the brand takes us back to the origin of luxury meeting high-street.

Embodying what we are with taste, ease and authenticity. Feeling good here and anywhere. These are the principles of Soeur, a French ready-to-wear label founded in 2008 by two sisters, Domitille and Angélique Brion, a complementary duo driven by a desire to dress women of all generations. They draw on their memories, their travels and a quintessentially French notion of style to create delicate, accessible and comfortable collections in timeless colors.

THE BRAND The family-owned, independent label SOFIE SCHNOOR was established by the designer SOFIE SCHNOOR in 2001. Sofie is driven by her creativity, designing only what she would wear herself or dress her own kids in. That honest, real-life basis gives the two brands a personal touch and an authentic feel that permeates all collections. Sofie grew up with creative parents who were working in the fashion business with several retail shops. As a child she used to accompany her parents to factories, fashion fairs and all the way through the design process, and therefore knows a good, sellable design when she creates one. It began with a shoe collection in 2001, followed by a children's collection named PETIT BY SOFIE SCHNOOR in 2007, before a clothing collection joined the range. SOFIE SCHNOOR is currently represented in department stores, online, shop-in-shops, large and small retailers, concessions, and high-end design shops across all continents. SOFIE SCHNOOR is represented in 600 retail stores around the world, in addition to the brands three self-owned shops in Denmark. True to the brand's beginnings, its style is still edgy cool, sporty chic with a playful twist across both collections. The SOFIE SCHNOOR collections reflect the demand from women and children for fashionable, cool clothes that feel comfortable.

Rooted in the grace of femininity and the power of womanhood, Soft Rebels oﬀers contemporary apparel, carefully designed and timely dropped in order to cater to the true everyday lives of women. We believe in embracing and empowering female diversity with quality that lasts beyond seasons. Simplicity. Life is complicated enough without making your wardrobe diﬃcult. Easy, stylish and made from premium, sustainable materials, our clothes are a mix of modern essentials and durable classics.Versatility. Our clothes are designed and made to last more than just one season - you’ll ﬁnd you bring them out year after year and wear them in a diﬀerent way and in diﬀerent combinations. Mix and match things to reﬂect your own personality - it’s the essence of versatility. Attitude. Soft Rebels are all about femininity with a rebellious edge and we believe our customers have the same attitude. The contradiction between the two is what makes us all both interesting and powerful.
Solid design menswear with a diverse appeal, wearability and a solid look. With its contemporary cut and timeless fit. Solid is prefect for both urban and outdoor environments.

Son Venïn is an Oslo-based independent perfume producer. The founder of Son Venïn, Dag Laska has a background in identity design and has a true passion for perfume and sensory experiences. ¨Memories in scent, Nordic heritage and the inherited democratic mindset of Scandinavians trigger and inspire me¨. Son Venïn embeds Nordic culture, into high-level niche products, aimed at the international market.

SORBET ISLAND’s creations conjure up an aura of magical vacations inspired by the surrounding enchanted Aegean landscape. All items are carefully crafted in Greece by a passionate team of artisans using premium materials, and are designed based on the principles of inclusivity, authenticity and positivity. SORBET ISLAND is sold in more than 5.000 stores worldwide and has also been featured in numerous prestigious fashion magazines, continuing in its mission to challenge beauty standards and change traditional perceptions of female beauty.

In 2014, founder Sophia Mamas embarked on a personal venture, crafting friendship bracelets for her loved ones. What began as a personal hobby evolved into SORBET ISLAND, a thriving multi-brand. The discovery of crinkle fabric marked a turning point, offering versatile and inclusive styles that embody the brand’s ideals. Our ONE SIZE collections, fitting XS-XXL and A to G cup, use this hyper-flexible texture to accommodate diverse figures. The brand challenges stereotypes and has been featured in prestigious fashion magazines, reshaping perceptions of female beauty. SORBET ISLAND’s creations conjure up an aura of magical vacations inspired by the surrounding enchanted Aegean landscape. All items are carefully crafted by a passionate team of artisans using premium materials, and are designed based on the principles of inclusivity, authenticity and sustainability.

Designed in Barcelona and handcrafted by a small group of artisans. Each one of our one-of-a-kind leather bags and wallets is created by using leftover or scraps of leather to reduce the environmental impact while preserving handmade traditional techniques and supporting the fair trade movement.

Soulland’s head designer, Silas Adler (b. 1985), founded Soulland in 2002 and what started as a small company specialized in print t-shirts has now grown into a well-established menswear brand represented in leading stores across the world. Soulland’s design esthetic is rooted in traditional Scandinavian craftsmanship and through great attention to the detailing of the clothes, classic menswear is reinterpreted with a present-day esthetic. This approach is recognizable in key Soulland items such as the Adler Fedora, which merges a classic fedora hat with a baseball cap.
